programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Miamin hylatyt. Miamin elainpoliisit kokevat tehtavan itselleen erityisen laheiseksi, kun he loytavat kaksi jo adoptoitua koiraa kadulta avun tarpeessa.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Ystavykset matkaavat syvalle Sambiaan tiikerikalasta tehtyjen havaintoja seuraten. Edessa on liki 650 kilometria soratieta, krokotiileja, virtahepoja ja pulaa polttoaineesta.

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 6. Biologi, kalastaja ja tutkimusmatkailija Jeremy Wade matkustaa ympari maailmaa tutkimaan vesistoja ja vesielamaa. Tutkimuskohteisiin lukeutuvat muun muassa havainnot myyttisista vesihirvioista seka alueet, joilta tietyt kalalajit ovat yhtakkia kadonneet. (Jeremy Wades Dark Waters, dokumenttisarja, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 3. Biologi, kalastaja ja tutkimusmatkailija Jeremy Wade matkustaa ympari maailmaa tutkimaan vesistoja ja vesielamaa. Tutkimuskohteisiin lukeutuvat muun muassa havainnot myyttisista vesihirvioista seka alueet, joilta tietyt kalalajit ovat yhtakkia kadonneet. (Jeremy Wades Dark Waters, dokumenttisarja, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 4. Zeusin taistelu eloonjaamisesta. Laakintatiimi tyoskentelee yon yli yrittaen pelastaa saksanpaimenkoiran, jolla on elainsuojaan saapuessaan syvalle hiertynyt kaulus. (Animal Cops Philadelphia, tosi-tv, USA, 2008)

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Tiimi pelastaa lampohalvauksesta karsivan koiran. Elainsuojeluyhdistyksen poliisit tutkivat ilmoitusta veitsella koiraa vastaan tehdysta hyokkayksesta.

programme.title: Adrift: 47 Days with Sharks
programme.desc: Toisen maailmansodan lentajat Louis Zamperini ja Russell Phillips selviytyivat 47 paivaa haita kuhisevilla vesilla heidan koneensa pudottua Tyyneen Valtamereen.

programme.title: Pandamonium
programme.desc: Kaikki jattilaispandat kuuluvat Kiinalle synnyinpaikasta riippumatta. San Diegossa syntynyt Mei Sheng lahtee Wolongiin - luonnolliseen kotimaahan, jota se ei ole koskaan nahnyt.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Lahestyva metsapalo pakottaa Stuart ja Toni Rinkerin pohtimaan ratkaisua huonosti menestyvalle omavaraistilalleen. Stuart kuitenkin vastustaa Raneyn palontorjuntaehdotusta.

programme.title: Everest: Beyond the Limit
programme.desc: Tapaturma aiheuttaa pahan pettymyksen yhdelle ykkosryhman jasenelle, kun ryhma lahtee kuolemanvyohykkeelta kohti huippua.

programme.title: Everest: Beyond the Limit
programme.desc: Kakkosryhma tekee vaivalloisen matkan Everestin huipulle, mutta loppujen lopuksi laskeutuminen aiheuttaa enemman vaaroja yhdelle ryhman jasenelle.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Matka maailman ympari nayttaa, miten koirasta tuli maailman arvostetuimpiin elaimiin kuuluva laji. Ihmisen parhaan ystavan tarina kulkee villipedosta lempeaksi lemmikiksi.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin.

programme.title: Return to Shark Island
programme.desc: Reunionin saaren haiden kohtaamiset ovat lisaantyva ongelma ja siksi paikalliset pelkaavat veteen menemista. Haitutkijat tutkivat meneillaan olevaa haikriisia loytaakseen haille ja ihmisille tavan elaa sovussa.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Pennsylvanian elaintensuojeluyhdistys auttaa takkuturkkista kulkukoiraa. Kissa, jonka kaulassa on suuri reika, kiidatetaan hoitoon.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Riutunut koira, joka painaa vain kolmanneksen normaalista painostaan, tuodaan elainsuojaan, ja tiimi auttaa kissaa, jonka jalka on juuttunut kaulukseen jo useita kuukausia sitten.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Osa kaupunkilaisista on kyllastynyt hetkisen maailman sykkeeseen ja haluaa muttaa maalle. Maaseudulla asumisessa on kuitenkin erilaisia haasteita. Niinpa apuun kiitaa eras erityinen perhe.

programme.title: Wild Mexico
programme.desc: Wild Mexico

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Surua riittaa tutkija Labradan yrittaessa pelastaa omistajiensa hylkaaman sairaan koiran. Nuori tytto pelastaa hevosen, joka on jatetty ilman ruokaa ja vetta.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 4. Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin. (Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet, tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Dokumenttisarja. Heti kun Dexter tuli taloon, se yritti tappaa Daisyn. Corey hankki Giver-kissan Sarahille syntymapaivalahjaksi, mutta nyt han haluaisi palauttaa sen.

programme.title: Pandamonium
programme.desc: Kevaan kiima-aika on alkanut, ja vuosittain taytyy syntya 15 pentua pandapopulaation sailymiseksi. Matkaamme myos Qinling-vuorille tarkkailemaan villipandoja.

programme.title: Eramaan laki
programme.desc: Kala- ja villielainpoliisit pyrkivat vapauttamaan uhkaavan karhun takaisin omaan elinymparistoonsa. Samalla pidatetaan myos rattikuski.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown elavat seitseman lapsensa kanssa omavaraistaloudessa, missa olemassaolo riippuu hyvasta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Omistajat Lisa ja Callu pelkaavat tanskandogginsa Merlinin puolesta, silla se kavelee etuvarpaillaan. Neurologi Annette Wessman epailee vikaa koiran selkarangassa tai kallossa.

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Kalastaja-tutkimusretkeilija Jeremy Wade matkustaa maailmalla pyydystamassa mahdollisimman monta erikoista lajia. Mita miehen koukkuun tarttuu?

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Fisherman and adventurer, Jeremy Wade, travels to South Africa, in search of some of the world’s most unusual fish. What will he discover?

programme.title: Villi Australia
programme.desc: Australian mantereella sijaitsee maailman suurin kesyton luonnonalue. Alkuperaiskansat ovat elaneet siella tarkkailemalla luontoa ja ottamalla siita oppia.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Irtokoiranpentujen ensimmaiset elinviikot Thaimaassa ovat vaaroja taynna. Kathmandussa koiria palvotaan ja ne puetaan kukkaseppeleisiin Tihar-festivaalin kunniaksi.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff kay ilmaisklinikalla ja tuo auton alle jaaneen koiran hoitoon. Toisella koiralla on mystinen myhkyra. Elainlaakari Baier haluaa pelastetun pennun omakseen.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Paul de Gelder ja James Glancy hyppaavat lentokoneesta kilometrin korkeudesta kokeillakseen millaista on syoksya maailman kaukaisimmille haita kuhiseville vesille.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Ohjelmasarja Pennsylvanian elainsuojeluyhdistyksesta. Tutkijat loytavat kahdeksan koiraa, jotka on kahlittu 22 kilon metalliketjuihin.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Dokumentaarinen sarja seuraa Pennsylvaniassa toimivan SPCA´s Humane Law Enforcementin tyota kaltoinkohdeltujen elaimien hyvaksi.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Muusikko Loun ja hanen kumppaninsa Staceyn tilaa uhkaavat veden aiheuttama eroosio ja rankkasateen aiheuttamat vakavat vahingot. Raneyt saapuvat apuun.

programme.title: Wild Dubai
programme.desc: Modernin Dubain taakse katkeytyy salaisuus: uskomaton villi luonto, joka kantaa ajatonta yhteytta aavikkoon, mereen ja kansan historiaan ja perinteeseen.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Elainjulmuuksien tutkijat uivat alligaattorivesissa pelastaakseen vammautuneen alligaattorin. Miamin tahan mennessa suurimmassa kaappauksessa maatilalta pelastetaan 400 elainta!

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff tekee kaikkensa pelastaakseen auto-onnettomuuteen joutuneen koiran jalat. Uusi eksoottisten elainten laakari tohtori Baier hoitaa laihtuvaa Burman pythonia.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi.

programme.title: Pandamonium
programme.desc: Kiinan Wolong Panda Reserve -suojelualueen pandoja on kuvattu vuoden ajan. Alueella tehdyn uraauurtavan tutkimuksen ansiosta siella on syntynyt 16 pentua.

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Nelja ihmisryhmaa pudotetaan keskelle Alaskan eramaata. Uutta kotia etsiessaan he kohtaavat karhuja, jaatikoita ja omat pelkonsa.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Seitsenlapsinen Brownien perhe elaa syvalla Alaskan eramaassa, sivilisaation ja sahkoverkkojen ulkopuolella, missa selviytyminen riippuu hyvasta keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Matkalla elainlaakariksi
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan kuuden elainlaakariopiskelijan elamaa ja opintoja heidan viimeisena opiskeluvuotenaan. Tulevien elainlaakareiden hoivissa apua saavat kaikenkarvaiset elaimet koosta riippumatta. (Life at Vet U, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit

programme.title: Julius Caesar: The Making of a Dictator
programme.desc: The rise to power of the Roman leader, telling the dramatic story of how nearly five centuries of democracy was overthrown in just 16 years, beginning as he sought to become consul, the highest political position in Rome. To do so, he entered into dangerous alliances and bent the rules of the republic, courting the popular vote, exploiting division and using bribery and intimidation to get his own way.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben returns to the remote Hungarian countryside to revisit Julia Pryke and Gareth Shone who just 16 months ago gave up the 9 - 5 in the UK to live in a ramshackle farmhouse in a country they had never visited.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Chip Hailstone, struggles to hunt in high winds. Avery and Gage drill for black fish. In Shageluk, Sonta and her children look for rabbit tracks.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben meets a former carpenter who now lives alone on a private island in the Icelandic wilderness. He discusses how a struggle with alcoholism drove him to turn his back on life in the big city, and enlists Bens aid in fishing and harvesting, as well as maintaining his yurt business. They also go swimming in the freezing waters and take a trek up the countrys most famous volcano - and discover how the island could be under threat from Icelands volatile environment.

programme.title: Japan with Sue Perkins
programme.desc: Sue Perkins enjoys a night out with Kyotos geishas, goes free diving with some ama divers and visits Hiroshima. In Tokyo, she explores how the Japanese are tackling the future.

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: A maverick fishing crew take on ten adrenaline-filled fishing trips around the world. Their first stop is Kenya.

programme.title: Julius Caesar: The Making of a Dictator
programme.desc: The rise to power of the Roman leader, telling the dramatic story of how nearly five centuries of democracy was overthrown in just 16 years, beginning as he sought to become consul, the highest political position in Rome. To do so, he entered into dangerous alliances and bent the rules of the republic, courting the popular vote, exploiting division and using bribery and intimidation to get his own way.

programme.title: Mammals: Making Of
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the series that explores the most successful animal group on Earth, from the tiny Etruscan shrew to the largest mammal in existence - the blue whale. 1/6

programme.title: Mammals: Making Of

programme.title: The Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: A trip through the Peak District at full steam, pulled by the Royal Scot, one of the finest locomotives ever built. On the way from Crewe to York, the train travels over Chat Moss on a line built by Robert Stephenson.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey find out what it takes for a factory to churn out 360,000 cans of rice pudding every day.

programme.title: Space Volcanoes
programme.desc: An international team of volcanologists draw parallels between the volcanoes on Earth and those on other planets, and reveal how they are not just a destructive force but essential to the formation of atmospheres and even life itself.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Northern Africa is home to the greatest desert on Earth, the Sahara. On the fringes, huge zebras battle over dwindling resources and naked mole rats avoid the heat by living a bizarre underground existence. Within the desert, where the sand dunes `sing, camels seek out water with the help of their herders and tiny swallows navigate across thousands of square miles to find a solitary oasis.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: From Douro to Sintra. Join us on a journey through some very British parts of Portugal. We start at the Douro railway and a winery that produces port wine before exploring how the royal families of England and Portugal became connected. Aveiro offers salted cod before the journey continues on a CP300 locomotive to Lisbon and a classic cream tart. Sintras magical palaces are the final destination of this episode.

programme.title: Inside the Factory

programme.title: Wonders of the Solar System
programme.desc: Episode looking at the sun - the powerhouse of our solar system.

programme.title: Spy in the Ocean
programme.desc: A new generation of spy creatures search the ocean for intelligent life and find ways of thinking that have to be seen to be believed. The most complex spy creature ever built films the owner of the largest brains on the planet – sperm whales. Spy Whale is the same size as a new-born whale calf and is equipped with an array of cameras. It even has a hydrophone to capture their calls. In a magical close encounter, Spy Whale is greeted by an inquisitive female who, in astonishing scenes, attempts to communicate. In a touching sign of acceptance, she even introduces her calf to Spy Whale. Getting to know the greatest mind in the invertebrate world requires a very different spy, one that’s a dead ringer for the coconut octopus it’s designed to meet. The octopus not only has a central brain; it also has a brain in each of its arms. Using its combined brainpower, it works out how best to steal a coconut shell carried by our spy. Its plan is to use the shell as a door to its hideaway to protect itself from predatory sharks. In another act of ingenuity, it improvises a shield and throws missiles at a rival octopus. It also shows a softer and more emotional side when it gives Spy Coconut Octopus a friendly and lingering embrace. In Thailand, Spy Macaque joins ocean-diving macaques as they forage underwater for seafood. Our spy captures a filming-first as the macaques catch fish with their bare hands. To break open oysters, they also use stone tools including our very own spy rock. In Japan, Spy Puffer becomes an artist’s assistant to a male Japanese puffer fish as he crafts exquisite sand sculptures in a quest to woo a mate. When he runs out of shells to use as decoration, Spy Puffer comes to the rescue, finding shells for the male to complete his masterpiece, enough to impress the most demanding art critic of all – his mate. Intelligence gathers pace when Spy Sea Lion meets the world’s fastest fish and the sea lions that hunt them. Marlin use teamwork to drive mackerel shoals to the surface only for them to be stolen by quick-thinking sea lions. When Spy Sea Lion takes us on a rollercoaster ride inside the shoal, its camera eyes show how the shoal’s swarm intelligence is pitched against that of the clever sea lions. It also discovers some extraordinary new behaviour as the sea lion gift some of their catch to the marlin. On a Caribbean beach, another spy meets the crab world’s most entertaining characters – hermit crabs. They may be comical in nature, but they also have highly developed organisational skills. When they’ve outgrown their shells, they line up in order of size to exchange them for a better fit. All is going well until Spy Hermit Crab loses its shell to a crab looking to upsize its accommodation. The crab becomes the unwitting camera operator as it captures a crab’s-eye view of the organised chaos. On another Caribbean island, a colony of wild pigs embrace beach life by taking a daily dip in the sea. Spy Pig joins their daily ritual as they forage for food brought in by visiting boats. As their ingenuity draws the crowds, Spy Pig gets caught up in the resulting feeding frenzy. Back on the reefs, Spy Coconut Octopus donates its shell to a family of enterprising clownfish. In an astonishing show of teamwork, the fish work together to move the shell back to their anemone home, creating a safe place to lay their eggs among the poisonous tentacles. In this action-packed first episode, our spies discover sea creatures with many mind-boggling ways of thinking, but none match those with the biggest brains of all – sperm whales. In more astonishing scenes, Spy Sperm Whale witnesses a rare and beautiful gathering as whale families from far and wide huddle together and exchange information – an extraordinary display of social intelligence, uncannily similar to our own.

programme.title: Clive Myries Caribbean Adventure
programme.desc: The Coronation Market is the largest street market in all of Jamaica, and it’s nestled in Downtown Kingston. It’s where Clive brushes up on his Jamaican patois and tries out some of the best street food on the island. He also catches up with a mural art collective who have been transforming this district before checking out a trendy boutique to get kitted out with some brand new Downtown threads, hoping to look the part for a night out at the hottest reggae club in town.

programme.desc: 6/7. Elainten on selviydyttava myos aariolosuhteissa kuten syvassa ja pimeassa luolassa tai pohjoisnavalla. Myos myrskyjen, maastopalojen ja kuivuuden kanssa on opittava elamaan. Planeettamme Maa III tarjoaa odotetun jatkon kahdelle edelliselle samannimiselle huippusarjalle. Sarja syvaluotaa maapallon monimuotoista luontoa, sen ekosysteemeja ja lajeja, meren syvyyksista kaukaisiin viidakoihin.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Richard falls from the roof while trying to turn the TV on and ends up in the hospital, but Granny Jojo takes over his care stating that Nicole is incapable of taking care of her family which causes great tension between the two Watterson women.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball thinks Teri is way too scared of germs. / Gumball and Darwin rent a film called A Ponys Tail to watch with Anais but keep getting distracted on their way home.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: When the Crimson Lord locks fans in a comic convention, most think its an Escape Room but L.J. knows its no game! With nowhere to go and Theo and Alisha outside, turning Jade would blow her cover. Unless, she improvises a new team inside…

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: When the Crimson Lord locks fans in a comic convention, most think its an Escape Room but L.J. knows its no game! With nowhere to go and Theo and Alisha outside, turning Jade would blow her cover. Unless, she improvises a new team inside…

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers’ market with Irma at her knitwear stall – right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but can’t afford it. When he visits a food truck that’s laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clint’s catchphrase – “Nobody gets left behind”, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wicket’s flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan… or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around – yum! But he’s told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artist’s studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time he’s let in, but will Bean’s fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal – revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and he’ll get a month’s rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout… doing all Mr Bean’s work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park – first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before he’s chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush wants to impress the Mushlets by showing off his sensing gift. But his sense-foot doesn’t work like it should. This is a disaster! And when Mushpot explains that some Mushables have to wait until they become Mushups to see their gifts fully developed, Mush-Mush is frustrated. He wants to master his gift now! Mush-Mush discovers that the solution he’s looking for might be in The Dark Dark Forest. Mush-Mush decides to take his friends Chep and Lilit on a little trip...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers lead Sushi-Mushi to believe that Pickled Swampost is Mushpot’s favourite dish when he cant stand it. Now they must try to stop Sushi-Mushi from serving this horrible food to Mushpot!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is the only Mushable who cant bend a small branch back to catapult himself between two trees. He feels weak and embarrassed. But when strength doesnt work, Chep realizes that its all in the technique!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: It seems like Starmush is the only one who can answer Mush-Mushs difficult questions. But Starmush lives so far away in the Dark Forest! Mush-Mush hatches a plan to get Starmush to move to Mushton, so he can get answers right here at home.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit remembers loving balancing on a slack-vine when she was a Mushlet. But actually, she never really learnt how, so she keeps falling off and getting really frustrated.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A newly unpacked UV tanning booth holds the place of honor in the middle of the cabin. Grizzy gets it into his head that a classy tan will help him draw the attention of the she-bear hes enamored with. When he opens the box, he discovers that the Lemmings have beat him to it and are already playing "beach party" inside the bed.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have turned the entire cabin topsy-turvy to organize medieval jousts with the rangers fencing gear. Grizzy, who wishes to recover his couch, tries to straighten up, but is driven out by their fencing foils. To retaliate, Grizzy must find a blade equal to the task. He opts for a fine... frozen swordfish!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A strange object is delivered to the Rangers cabin: an over-board! Its a latest generation skateboard which levitates above the ground without wheels.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the joys of photography with the rangers instant print camera. Grizzy would like to make a beautiful artistic portrait of the she-bear hes in love with, whereas the Lemmings prefer a group photo with a face-making competition: two radically opposed artistic trends!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The fridge in the cabin has changed: it’s been replaced by a brand new state-of-the-art appliance which analyzes the body fat percentage of whoever wants to serve himself, before selecting the appropriate foodstuffs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a demonstration of balloon modelling on TV. He decides to make a balloon poodle to offer to the she-bear hes enamored with. By observing Grizzy, the Lemmings discover with enthusiasm that you can blow up modelling balloons far more than regular ones, and that they end up exploding in a shower of tattered strips.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs a nice nap. He cant find a pillow comfortable enough to his taste until he tests the pillow that the Lemmings use as a high-jump mat. The pillow is so soft that Grizzy falls asleep the second he lays his head on it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is awakened from his nap by the unpleasant, ongoing sound of Velcro strips being ripped off. The Lemmings have covered their bodies in Velcro and are throwing themselves against a doormat, which serves as their target. Grizzy finds peace and quiet by getting rid of the doormat until the Lemmings realize that bear fur is an ideal support for Velcro.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The she-bear Grizzy is enamored with has lost her favorite flower in an inaccessible spot under a giant boulder. Grizzy tries to lift it: impossible! He decides to start an intensive bodybuilding routine with the rangers electrostimulation machine, but the Lemmings are already using it on a caribou to step up their rodeo.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the rangers mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one that’s perfect but is outraged when he’s told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers he’s one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find it’s closed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his ‘princess’. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their ‘relaxing’ holiday!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero ‘Super Spy’ and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers’ house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes scoutmaster for the day, but his obsession with badge collecting does not help him make friends.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To finally bring life-long friends Mushpot and Starmush back together, Truff goes to help Starmush succeed at an impossible challenge set by Musho…

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpie gets sick, our Mushlers find it impossible to believe that she turns into the most demanding Mushable ever. Well, theyre about to find out that its all true!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Fung finds out that to earn a delicious treat from Sushi-Mushi you just need to look after the Food Snail for him. No problem! Actually, it becomes a huge problem for Fung!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpot is too tired to give anyone advice, he asks Mush-Mush to answer the Mushables requests on his behalf. But now Mush-Mush thinks he is the leader of Mushton!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Chep thinks he has remembered that he is younger than his two best friends, Mush-Mush and Lilit, it affects his whole confidence.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is pulled out of his dreams by the rambunctious Lemmings who are jousting on sheep. The sly bear gets rid of the rodents by enticing their mounts away with food.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pursues the Lemmings throughout the castle to recover the jelly cake they stole from him. In an impasse, the bear runs smack into a ghost.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a giant jelly cake. Their chase leads them to the castle library, where the Lemmings accidentally activate the opening of a secret passage.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases the Lemmings throughout the castle to swipe the delicious jelly cake they were about to eat. He locks them inside a closet and makes off with the dessert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun bouncing off the backs of green frogs while Grizzy chases some mosquitos buzzing around him. Displeased, the rodents replace Grizzys green frogs with poisonous orange ones that paralyze anyone who touches them!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize an obstacle course in their cabin. Grizzy ejects the Lemmings from the cabin and they crash onto an Incan temple where they discover a spheric object that can control the Earths rotation.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get hold of an old pinball machine and install it in the cabin. Their furious party interrupts Grizzys nap and the bear threatens to break the contraption.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy, a big chocolate lover, is growing a young cacao tree under an ultraviolet lamp. During a trampoline session, the Lemmings accidentally break the lamp, provoking a supernatural reaction.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: During a fight, Grizzy and the Lemmings stumble upon a Mayan temple lost in the jungle. Once inside, they set off a magic reaction that creates doubles of themselves at different ages. They now have a Grizzy babe and elderly Lemmings. Grizzy tries to get the young bear interested in a documentary on salmon, while the Lemmings want to initiate their ancestors to dance. But age differences are not so easily defeated.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at the supermarket when he spots a cool fire engine ride – but the security guard makes it clear it’s for little kids only. Not to be deterred, Mr Bean tries everything he can to distract the guard to have his go on the ride. When he finally does get his go, it’s not as good as he thought it would be, especially when a real fire engine has to be called to help Mr Bean!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean receives a delivery of a bunch of flowers for Mrs Wicket, but accidentally runs them over in the his car. He can’t afford to replace them, so he decides to recreate the bunch by taking flowers one by one from anywhere he can - a vase in a cafe, a wedding bouquet, even from between the teeth of a tango dancer! But will he assemble the bunch and be back in time for Mrs Wicket?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets so engrossed playing with Mr Paliwal’s new drone that he doesn’t notice a car thief stealing his car. They quickly jump into Mr Paliwal’s car and use the drone to track the stolen car to the thief’s warehouse hideout. Using the drone, they discover a criminal car-stealing operation – but will they be able to outwit the car thieves using Mr Paliwal’s flying gadget?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is dragging a very bored Mr Bean around a shopping centre when he spots a competition for Minty Mints – pull your silliest face for a photo and win a cash prize! Mr Bean tries to queue but it’s too long - so he persuades Irma to visit a photo studio offering romantic photoshoots. Can Mr Bean get away with pulling funny faces and submit the photo to the Minty Mints people without Irma knowing?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Scrapper claws a rip in Teddy, Mr Bean rushes him to the Teddy hospital. As Teddy is being fixed, Mr Bean is rather taken with another Ted on sale in the shop. He decided to take Big Ted home with him once Teddy is fixed. But at home it seems as though Big Ted is freezing Teddy out, and after a particularly terrifying nightmare, Mr Bean realises he has to get rid of his new guest.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When the Lemmings spoil Grizzys meal with their new game, the bear evicts them far from the cabin. They crash onto a faraway picnic table.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are holding a log throwing competition that stops short when Grizzy sends them soaring into the distance.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the TV remote control. The argument leads the bear to the summit of the castle tower during a storm.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a whale of a time revamping the paintings on display in the castle by painting themselves alongside the illustrated noblemen.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang goes on a camping trip, although they cant really agree on why. Freds desire for the gang to get in touch with their natural instincts and hones their mystery skills, turns into on-the-job training as Viking Ghosts attack and attempt to drive them away – or worse.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred staat terecht, veroordeeld voor het brein achter alle mysteries die hij heeft opgelost. Met de hulp van zijn advocaat, Daphne, gaan ze terug naar de gebeurtenissen van de dag in een stad die sinds de jaren 1950 was verlaten vanwege een giftige chemische lekkage waar een toxische mutant iedereen die in de buurt van de stad komt geterroriseert.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When King Tut steals an ancient artifact that makes his Carcophagus magically fast, MOE equips Bam with rocket boosters to catch the villain and Bam must learn how to control all that speed.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Now that Catwoman has equipped Kitty with wings, Batwing tries to teach the easily-distracted Kitty how to fly. / When Harley Quinn’s Hyena goes missing, Bibi agrees to help Jestah look for her.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mel is in a pessimistic funk, Barney takes the kids on a trip to the Enchanted Forest to help an optimistic fairy with an injured wing. Mel learns how to adopt an optimistic mindset to overcome adversity and help the fairy.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When a blackout upends Vivies evening plans, Barney and the kids pivot to night time fun with help from the community. / When Mel and her dads road trip gets cancelled, Mel takes him on an imaginary trip instead so they can still spend time together.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - Titanic. Now he simply has to park the car. But when youre Mr Bean, nothings simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled. And the clock is ticking....

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A local archaeology dig inspires Bean to go in search of treasure. But why buy a metal detector when you can make one from lawnmower parts and a dustbin lid? After destroying his landlady’s back garden, Mr. Bean tries out his hand-made contraption in the woods. He is overjoyed to discover a buried chest of gold doubloons. However, his happiness is soon thwarted by the arrival of two baddies, the police and a very angry Landlady.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own ‘No Littering’ signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentine’s Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irma’s attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a ‘date’ to the Valentine’s Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-teller’s prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Magg’s pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput takes refuge in a fancy hotel. Specs and Skinny bluff their way past the doorman by acting like they come from the expensive side of the tracks. Spoiler: they don’t.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs spot Lamput in the audience of a magic show and try to catch him. The chase takes them backstage where Lamput evades the Docs with the help of different magic contraptions until Specs and Skinny unknowingly ends up on stage. They become reluctant assistants to the Magician who is about to perform some death-defying tricks – with the help of the Docs!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs, Lamput stumbles into a hole in the ground, which leads in an underground civilization with a large tribe in it! Lamput gets misunderstood as the Chosen One according to the tribe’s prophecy. The tribe hails Lamput as the prophet and this proves to be a huge challenge for the Docs to catch Lamput, now that Lamput is surrounded by worshippers and guards at all times!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy expels the Lemmings from the cabin where they had built a cumbersome obstacle course. Peaceful at last and feeling lazy, he is determined not to leave his couch. The Lemmings discover a magic Mayan disc that allows you to choose instantaneous mutations of other animals’ features: bat wings, reindeer antlers, elephant trunks, etc. The mutant Lemmings return to the cabin, determined to continue playing their game while enjoying their new accessories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As they fight over the last jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings accidentally send it flying deep into the jungle. They both set out in search for the jar, but in a forest that dense, it’s an impossible mission. In a Mayan Temple, the Lemmings discover a magic bracelet that increases one’s sense of smell tenfold and use it to find the jar. Grizzy loses their trail, but finds some Mayan bracelets himself: one for eyesight and one for hearing. Enough to infallibly track down the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Just as Grizzy is about to go to bed, he ousts the Lemmings who are holding a surprise party in the cabin. The Lemmings land in a Mayan Temple devoted to the moon. While toying with an ancestral console, the Lemmings set off a cosmic phenomenon that brings the moon, which is now the size of a disco ball, to the temple. In its aura, gravity becomes very weak. Enough to get rid of Grizzy and have a very original fiesta.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy does his best to get rid of the Lemmings and enjoy some peace and quiet in the cabin, but each time they come back with a new and even more-disturbing activity. When he sees some penguins marching in a perfectly disciplined line, Grizzy decides to teach the Lemmings how to behave in his presence. He locks himself up with them inside the garage, which has been transformed into an elementary school classroom. Grizzy is determined to make discipline reign but he has forgotten about the Lemming’s natural penchant for bedlam.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight once again and cause an accident with Santa Claus’ sled. The Lemmings rush to the crash site and get their hands on Santa’s magic bag. While Grizzy is tidying up the cabin after their fight, he is baffled to see the Lemmings come back him, quiet and calm. The rodents break out into Christmas carols and prepare a delicious snack for Grizzy before slipping out again. Suspicious, Grizzy follows them and discovers that the bag rewards persons whose wishes are equal to their goodwill.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings do not agree on which program to watch on TV. Grizzy confiscates the remote-control device. He thinks he’s won the battle, but the Lemmings find another one at the research station. A furious combat begins until the adversaries realize that the research station device has a special button that controls objects.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Papa tells his fractured version of the Jack and the Beanstalk story to the Bavarian mouse trio.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: To Tom and Jerrys delight Gingers new no junk food in the house diet causes Rick to sleep walk every night to the local fast food joint.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry take the scouts on a camping trip to canyon country and get more than they bargained for when a coyote pup shows up.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The gang get more than they bargained for when they try to shoo away a seemingly docile spider.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A Tom and Jerry chase through Postlewaite Manor results in major injuries to Cates which places his defense of the Butlers Linen Gloves Boxing Title in jeopardy.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry pretends to be a ghost to terrorize Tom -- until he gets a fright of his own.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird sacrifices his stealth muffler tech to sound as loud as the other Batwheels but his modifications backfire when Robin needs his stealthy skills to catch the elusive Catwoman!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batcomputer shuts down for a system update, the other Batwheels must take over for her while aiding Batman in a battle against Harley Quinn.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred gets a call for help from Chuck, his daredevil of a best friend, leading the gang on a rescue mission deep in the caverns of an ancient civilization.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Its Scoobys dream come true as the gang visits the set of his favorite TV show and he meets the star, his celebrity crush, a dog actress who plays a detective on the screen. Now all Scooby has to do is work up the courage to actually talk to her while also solving the mystery of the monstrous Gargoyle attacking the production!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is waiting for Irma at the park for a picnic, when he sees a nervous man rehearsing an engagement proposal to his girlfriend. Mr Bean tries to show him how it’s done but manages to send the engagement ring flying! It lands in a bicycle basket, gets flicked into a pram, flung onto an ice cream - Mr Bean has to chase it around the park as it keeps being launched from place to place, in the hope he can save the day!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwal’s precious plant once a day while he’s on holiday. It’s all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbour’s gadgets while he’s away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night – but Mr Bean’s other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwal’s got a burglar!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid won’t shut as it’s too full of rubbish – and by the time he’s shut it, they’ve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they won’t notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean… who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drops Irma off at the airport – she and Lottie are going on a lovely sunny holiday without them. To cheer Teddy up, Mr Bean has a brainwave - don’t worry, we’ll have a holiday right here at home! So Mr Bean goes about recreating all the things he saw in Irma’s brochure – a flight on an Bean Airways and a stay at Hotel Bean with sea view and a pool! Hope Irma is having a great time too…

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: At a funfair, Mr Bean wins a balloon for Teddy and ties it to him while he plays on the hook a duck. But he’s so engrossed he doesn’t notice his companion floating away! Soon Mr Bean is chasing Teddy as he glides and snags on various fairground rides. Will Mr Bean rescue Teddy before he floats away forever?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are holding a log throwing competition that stops short when Grizzy sends them soaring into the distance.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the TV remote control. The argument leads the bear to the summit of the castle tower during a storm.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a whale of a time revamping the paintings on display in the castle by painting themselves alongside the illustrated noblemen.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy puts a stop to the Lemmings furious rodeo game on a sheep. Annoyed, they decide to banish the bear to the bottom of the castle dungeons while hes taking a nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jelly cake, Grizzy banishes the Lemmings to the castle dungeons and the rodents discover a passageway leading to a secret elfin room.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is pulled out of his dreams by the rambunctious Lemmings who are jousting on sheep. The sly bear gets rid of the rodents by enticing their mounts away with food.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pursues the Lemmings throughout the castle to recover the jelly cake they stole from him. In an impasse, the bear runs smack into a ghost.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick buys a drone that Tom and Jerry immediately put to use for their own high-jinks.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its time for the annual croquet tournament at the Manor. The butler tells Tom how important it is to the Lady of the Manor to always win…no matter what! The last thing they need is any pesky rodents interfering with the game. Knowing any sighting of Jerry or Tuffy would cast Tom in a bad light, hes determined to keep them off the lawn.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is put in charge of getting the manors dog into showdog shape, unfortunately Jerry will try to sabotage him.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger go to a couples retreat, they leave Tom with Ricks Auntie Louella. Hearing that shes a whiz in the kitchen, Jerry comes along. The old woman is sweet, but she has a nasty little lap dog that bedevils Tom like crazy. Louella keeps treating Tom poorly, and Tom and Jerry make their plans to escape.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Lady of the Houses cousins, the Van der Snoots, visit with their prize-winning Persian cat, Prancy Van der Snoot. Tom is warned to make sure that Snooty doesnt catch sight of the pesky manor mice, lest she get upset or dirty her snowy white paws chasing the vermin. Tom is on it, but nothing goes as planned...

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is watching a hypnotist on TV, when the words "you are asleep" hit him hard. He becomes a virtual rag doll and ends up in a jumble of junk for Rick and Gingers yard sale. A woman who thinks hes a stuffed animal buys him. Jerry feels bad and hops aboard the car to rescue Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom accidentally visits a bizarre twin version of his house.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After a series of beatings from Tom, Jerry storms off into his mouse hole. Soon he falls asleep and dreams himself to be the Lord of Downton Abbey! Tom is now servant to Lord Jerry, and the Master wastes no time in making Toms life miserable. Tom is caught in the act of exacting revenge, so Lord Jerry challenges Tom to a duel in the dream world.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry is feeling lonely and wishes he had a girlfriend. Spike explains spring fever to Tom and they leave him be. Jerrys mood improves when he gets a message from his brawny cousin Muscles, who has fixed him up with his girlfriends friend for a double date.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean can’t bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when youve got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is struggling to sell items from her knitwear stall at the market, so sends Mr Bean to collect a sheep costume he can wear to attract customers. Once at the fancy dress shop however, Mr Bean gets stuck in the sheep costume and has to travel back to the market wearing it. Things go from bad to worse when Mr Bean takes a short cut across the field and gets caught up in a flock of real sheep!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean spots a rare book - the Teddy Bear Haunting - in a bookshop, but it’s too expensive to buy. He secretly tries to read it in the shop… until he’s thrown out. To his dismay someone else then buys the book – so he follows the buyer around trying to read over his shoulder. Will Mr Bean manage to get to the end of the book before getting spotted?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave, unbeknownst to the rest of the Bat-Family.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Jestah injures herself preparing for an extreme sports competition with the other Zoomers, Bibi helps her overcome her fear of going to the mechanic so she can heal up in time to compete.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Buffs trusty winch is knocked out of action by Poison Ivy, he must learn to improvise and come up with creative solutions on the fly.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Snowy and Jestah team up to execute a mysterious plan involving rare freeze-berries, Batwing and Buff pair up to take on the dastardly duo, but Batwing decides to carry out the mission herself, putting both her and Buff at risk.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry take their chase to the skies. Kite-flying has never been this intense. Who will emerge as the ultimate master of strings?

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Baby Bop keeps having meltdowns during a game with the kids, making it hard for everyone to play together. Barney steps in to figure out what is causing Baby Bops upsets and helps her manage them so everyone can continue to have fun.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mel grows frustrated with the things she cant do while wearing a cast, Barney creates an imaginative game for the kids to play. Throughout the game, Mel learns to embrace her abilities with the help of a fantastical robot arm.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Nutty Hill is suffering from a stifling heat wave. Searching in vain for a bit of cool air, Grizzy suddenly has a brilliant idea.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is frustrated: just as he was about to coat a nice big fresh salmon with chocolate spread and snuggle up in front of the TV he discovers that the pantry is empty!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Freed by the thawing ice, a mysterious giant egg slides up to the front door of the log cabin. The Lemmings watch the hatching of a large baby dinosaur that immediately mistakes them for his "mummies". Grizzy cannot tolerate a new intruder like this in the cabin, but how does he earn the respect of a gang of Lemmings who are armed with a T-Rex, even it is only a baby?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In order to seduce the she-bear hes infatuated with, Grizzy decides to take things in hand and slim down with the rangers bodybuilding equipment. But before starting his exercise routine, he will first have to settle the problem of the Lemmings, who are already using the machines as an amusement park.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: By chance, Grizzy discovers that the rangers new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages. But the Lemmings see the new gadget more as a competition bumper car.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Safety standards at the Docs Lab remain shockingly low. Once, just once, it would be nice to invent something that doesnt then get out of hand and backfire, causing widespread chaos. Well, this shrink ray aint it. At first it works great (which is typical). Lamput is caught in a tiny vial, and the Docs are riding high on the triumph. Then they go over a small bump. Their risk management plan doesnt account for a "small bump". Before long Lamput and Skinny are engaged in a high speed chase through the Boss moustache. Seriously. Someone should just shrink this Lab right out of existence. No, wait, that happens too.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Pursuing Lamput is a dastardly career, but theres a right and a wrong way to go about it. Doc Specs cuts corners, showing up at the Lab with a fake Lamput made out of a jar of marmalade and a couple ping pong balls - a Jamposter! Specs relishes his new role as hero of the day, but his best friend Skinny smells a rat. As does Lamput, who is patently NOT captured. Not to mention a battalion of ants who dont care at all about Specs professional fortunes. Specs plan has a serious use-by date. Lucky Skinny can forgive. As a friend, hes the real deal.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: To escape the clutches of his dastardly pursuers, Lamput leaps onto Skinnys head and poses as a luscious mane of auburn hair. Shouldnt work. Works. Too well; Specs falls head over heels for this new redhead. Skinnys a bit puzzled as to why his bespectacled buddy is acting so weird all of a sudden. The course of true love never runs smooth; nor does the course of a moronic mixup between two annoying nerds. A wigless Skinny "crashes" Specs big fancy date (which, you know, Skinny was invited to) and Specs is very rude indeed about it. Now theyve both got broken hearts. Luckily ice-cream fixes everything.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a stubborn bird deliberately defecates his Mini, Mr. Bean washes it. After the passing motorist mistakenly thinks that Bean runs a car wash, Bean makes some makeshift car washing equipment at the side of the road. Mrs. Wicket joins Bean by offering tea to the motorist. Soon after, Bean is washing cars that belong to the Royal Queen but the same bird defecates on the car.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wickets flat but her sideboard tumbles over, and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it, he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realising that it is only his landladys furry hat, Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vet in a desperate attempt to save his feline friends life.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean cannot, for the life of him, place the face of the uninvited fat bloke on his doorstep. An old school photograph and school cap just about jog his memory. By this time his new ‘friend’ has put his feet up and is eating Bean out of house and home. This blast from the past proves to be a blasted pain in the neck.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma Gobb comes round to watch TV and Bean finds that liking different programmes to your girlfriend can be very bad for a relationship. After an explosive argument the TV blows up, forcing Mr. Bean to invent his own very ingenious form of home entertainment.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy en Scooby ontdekken hun nieuwe lievelingseten wanneer de gang onderzoek doet naar het mysterie van een angstaanjagende voetballer die ronddwaalt in een snackfabriek!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show

programme.desc: Meathead turns into a genius when he gulps down a bottle of specially formulated water.
