programme.desc: The Duke returns from India with some wild animals that escape their cages and begin to terrorize the manor. Tom is tasked with putting everything back in order.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A stranger with a divining rod promises to find water for the farm.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The gang get more than they bargained for when the dog next door shows up.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry save King Arthurs kingdom from and evil sorcerer, Morgan.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pursues the Lemmings throughout the castle to recover the jelly cake they stole from him. In an impasse, the bear runs smack into a ghost.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a giant jelly cake. Their chase leads them to the castle library, where the Lemmings accidentally activate the opening of a secret passage.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases the Lemmings throughout the castle to swipe the delicious jelly cake they were about to eat. He locks them inside a closet and makes off with the dessert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun bouncing off the backs of green frogs while Grizzy chases some mosquitos buzzing around him. Displeased, the rodents replace Grizzys green frogs with poisonous orange ones that paralyze anyone who touches them!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize an obstacle course in their cabin. Grizzy ejects the Lemmings from the cabin and they crash onto an Incan temple where they discover a spheric object that can control the Earths rotation.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When The Looney Builders build Taz a wrecking ball vehicle, he struggles to learn how to operate it.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders face underwater challenges as they build a sea school for Moxie Manatee.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Moxie Manatee hires The Looney Builders to build an obstacle course for the Sandy Shells Preschool Games, but Lola isn’t listening to her crew.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a party boat for Mac and Tosh when Tweety accidentally makes a mistake but doesn’t ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders try to help Winston Whale by building him a mail truck, but Winston is used to working alone.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Snowy and Jestah team up to execute a mysterious plan involving rare freeze-berries, Batwing and Buff pair up to take on the dastardly duo, but Batwing decides to carry out the mission herself, putting both her and Buff at risk.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When all of the Batwheels (except for Bam) mysteriously disappear, Bam enlists the help of A.D.A.M, the original Batmobile, to help save his friends. Along the way, Bam comes to appreciate the old-school mobiles different crimefighting style as they team up to take on the Legion of Zoom.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Much to everyone’s surprise, Bam is secretly afraid of the dark. When Poison Ivy knocks out all the power in Gotham, Bam must conquer his fears to stop her.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Redbird tries his hand at espionage as “V-8, the Super-Spy”, he quickly realizes hes gotten in over his head.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has a terrible no-good day after she keeps messing up and lets Joker get away. She doesn’t think he can help Batgirl anymore, but a “bad today” doesn’t mean it’ll be a “bad tomorrow".

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputer’s motherboard. / When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave. / Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show. / Bam brings Catwomans Catmobile to life so the Batwheels can have even teams for their game of "Bat-Ball".

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Squirm and Manny show us some classic dance moves!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is struggling to sell items from her knitwear stall at the market, so sends Mr Bean to collect a sheep costume he can wear to attract customers. Once at the fancy dress shop however, Mr Bean gets stuck in the sheep costume and has to travel back to the market wearing it. Things go from bad to worse when Mr Bean takes a short cut across the field and gets caught up in a flock of real sheep!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean spots a rare book - the Teddy Bear Haunting - in a bookshop, but it’s too expensive to buy. He secretly tries to read it in the shop… until he’s thrown out. To his dismay someone else then buys the book – so he follows the buyer around trying to read over his shoulder. Will Mr Bean manage to get to the end of the book before getting spotted?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are enjoying a day at the arcade, when Mr Bean gets carried away with the dance machine, knocking Teddy onto the floor. Teddy’s picked up, put on a trolley of stuffed toys and figurines – and soon enough, he’s been put in the claw machine as a prize! Mr Bean has run out of coins, so has to find a way of winning Teddy back without looking like he’s cheating!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are looking forward to seeing a once-in-a-lifetime comet – but it won’t appear until 4am! He tries to stay up, but it’s useless – he keeps dropping off. So instead, Mr Bean decides to go to bed and set an alarm – yet he over-winds the clock and it breaks! With all the shops closed, his only option is to build his own complicated version to make sure he doesn’t miss the comet…

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. Mr Bean gets bored, and on a wander around the hospital he finds a spare doctor’s outfit with stethoscope – great Teddy - I’ll give you a check-up! But a nurse spots him, and thinking he’s a new doctor Mr Bean is asked to visit patients. How long can he keep it up before he’s found out?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep and Mush-Mush sometimes don’t listen to Lilit. So when she tries to tell them about her great idea to have a special firefly night, they instead believe it is their idea. Grrr! Whose special firefly night will come out on top?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Bolly hurts his foot and can’t go fast until it heals. Phooey! But when everyone gives him treats to cheer him up, Bolly decides he never wants his foot to heal.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is over-joyed when his weevil friend, Chase, returns to Mushton. But Chase seems to have changed, hes way harder to handle now. And he wants something from Chep! But what?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has to give the Mushlets a talk about spiders. But talking in front of a group makes Chep nervous. Mush-Mush offers to do it instead. Problem is Mush-Mush’s knowledge of spiders is so bad he ends up getting caught by one!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers want Amanita to join in telling monster stories. But Amanita doesnt believe in monsters. So they take her on a monster hunt and find more than they imagined.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep wants to be brave enough to join in the daring games that Mush-Mush and Lilit like to play. So he gets some protective moss pants that make him not only indestructible but also fashionable… and a bit cocky. Woo, it’s the new Chep!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast testing every app on the rangers tablet one by one. Grizzy, who is starving, sees that the cupboards are bare. When he realizes that one GPS app can give the itinerary to the nearest chocolate spread store, Grizzy requisitions the tablet.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the rangers latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature format. Grizzy wants to redecorate the cabin with figurines bearing his effigy, but first he needs to get rid of the Lemmings. Without getting them mixed up with their perfect resin replicas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a strange gateway to a parallel world. On the other side, there is the same cabin, only it doesnt belong to a ranger. Its a chocolate spread museum, where the curators are... another Grizzy and other Lemmings, all with very different personalities.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch their favorite program. While looking for a backup zapper, they happen onto a top secret Canadian Army prototype that enables you to apply the usual controls: "play," "pause" and "fast forward" to living beings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that by changing the speed limit sign on the side of the road they can create a huge draft that is just perfect for their extreme kiting game.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While trying to stop the Lemmings from playing their extreme trampoline game, Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. Seeing that she wants more, Grizzy decides to become a champ in the sport. But for that to happen, the Lemmings will need to let him work out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. To recover the supply of cookies, which were to be his afternoon snack, Grizzy has no qualms about making the Lemmings sled skid out of control. When the sled hits a superheros spacecraft, a mysterious costume falls out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up… a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play with poseable figurines of wild Canadian animals. When Grizzy sees that the bear figurine has been put inside a little cage, whereas those of the Lemmings are gathered around a mini-jar of chocolate spread, he decides to join in the party and take control of his own figurine.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a new generation Tamagotchi game on the Rangers tablet: the camera scans the player and gives him a virtual avatar of himself to take care of.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When theres no milk for his tea and for Teddy, Mr. Bean goes to buy some. However, instead of parking near the grocery store because of the traffic warden, he parks his car at a nearby school where he is mistaken by the principal as the new teacher and is forced to teach a group of juvenile delinquents. But he actually may be a better teacher than he thought.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Bean’s resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. It’s a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irma’s birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. There’s no time to lose as Mr Bean promises he’ll get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Bean’s phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Bean’s house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But it’s not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are ecstatic: Muddlers fear of spiders rid the forest of him! But they soon learn that even Muddler is essential to the health of the forest.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit looks up to Chanterelle as an awesome role model. She would so love to be like her one day. But when she starts imitating Chanterelle it doesn’t go to plan.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has a bad feeling. There is something he knows he should remember but can’t. When he finally pieces his memories together, he gets what his bad feeling was about – Mushton is about to be attacked by a plague of hungry woodworms! Prepare the defences!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and friends "favourite play tree" the Fun Tree - is rotten and doomed. But Mush-Mush refuses to give up on it. In a last ditch effort to save the tree, our friends adventure off to try and track down the legendary Starmush, hoping his mysterious healing powers can save it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Short on food supplies, Grizzy has gone out to gather fruit. He comes back with a basketful but discovers that the Lemmings have stolen the last of the chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take off with the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread. Grizzy catches up with them but they drop the jar and it lands in a nearby sacred temple. Grizzy and the Lemmings must solve riddles along the path to the Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize wrestling combats on the living room couch. Grizzy, weary of the clamor, stops the match. The displeased Lemmings retaliate, but during their fight the cabins wood floor caves in and they all fall into an old sidecar!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After a spat over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings find gold leaf-wrapped chocolate bits scattered in the jungle. Delicious! On the backs of a bat and a tapir, the rodents and the bear fight over the harvest of candy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Night has fallen and the solar panels do not generate enough electricity to charge Grizzys TV. He sees the Lemmings playing with fireflies that could make his panels work, and tries to distract the Lemmings and capture the fireflies.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After stealing Grizzys jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the Lemmings propel the bear far from the log cabin. Grizzy lands in a temple where he finds a crystal skull which gives you the power to sow discord within a group. Grizzy uses it to set the rodents at odds amongst themselves and takes advantage of the general fight to recover the chocolate spread. But the effects of the magic skull only last a certain time and the ill-feelings cease. The Lemmings unite to give Grizzy a taste of his own medicine!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While climbing back to the cabin carrying a load of delicious berries, Grizzy trips and falls over backwards. He performs a series of acrobatics worthy of a diving champ and resurfaces safe and sound despite himself. The Lemmings, who saw everything, are in awe and treat Grizzy like an idol. Grizzy starts to enjoy this VIP treatment until the Lemmings ask him to repeat his exploit. Grizzy agrees but discovers that the Lemmings have built a giant diving board for the occasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings lose their jar of chocolate spread in a labyrinthian Temple. Determined to recover their favorite afternoon snack, they confront one another in the maze, but end up getting totally lost. Grizzy finds himself back at square one and decides to find something to make holes in the walls and cheat. As for the Lemmings, they discover a magic map of the place that enables you to orient yourself and modify the corridors in real time. Which cheater will win?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Things start to disappear from the log cabin as if by magic. Grizzy is persuaded that the Lemmings are the culprits, but the Lemmings are also victims of inexplicable thefts. As they argue, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the true authors of the repeated thefts: a gang of fanatic partridges who bring stolen objects as offerings to their goddess, a giant partridge. Grizzy and Lemmings join forces to infiltrate the nest and recover their belongings.

Mr Bean is determined to win but hadn’t counted on the competitive dad’s dirty tricks!

programme.desc: Grizzy puts a stop to the Lemmings furious rodeo game on a sheep. Annoyed, they decide to banish the bear to the bottom of the castle dungeons while hes taking a nap.

programme.desc: The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them.

programme.desc: Grizzy pursues the Lemmings throughout the castle to recover the jelly cake they stole from him. In an impasse, the bear runs smack into a ghost.

programme.desc: There’s easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration – and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.desc: Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. programme.desc: After receiving a terrible blow over the head, Grizzy is no longer the same: he thinks hes a rodent! He tries to get the gang to adopt him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the Lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs come up with a new gadget, giving them the ability to take on the animal’s strength to take Lamput down!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput and Specs find themselves on an island. Spec learns a harsh lesson on listening.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput’s been caught! The Docs don’t have much to do now but to give tours to visiting students. Until one of these students, Tuzki specifically, gets lost. Will Tuzki find his way back to class? Not unless Lamput has something to do with it.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: From competitive eating to channeling his inner superhero, Mr. Bean’s bungling antics land him in all sorts of new sticky situations this season.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they won’t forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean would like to learn to play a Beethoven symphony, so he arranges a piano, a music book, a candlestick and a very patient piano teacher. It can be done this way too, Liberace!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean takes part in a Fun Run. He starts next to his biggest enemy: the fat guy who stole his parking space. Fun Run or not, Bean is going to beat this guy at the finish line, even if he has to take a taxi along the way.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang hits the ski slopes, but the fun is soon interrupted by the appearance of an evil Snowman Monster eager to scare all trespassers off his mountain.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: It’s Christmas Eve, and Fred is ready to solve a Christmas mystery! Unfortunately, the town the gang has arrived in is being attacked by a Pterodactyl, and it doesn’t seem to have anything to do with Christmas!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: On vacation in the west with Rick and Ginger Tom and Jerry encounter the legendary Jackalope!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The cat and mouse detective are hired to find a missing rare diamond.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A bet between two farmers over who can raise the biggest pig goes haywire for the farmhands.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An ancient flying machine is discovered in Postlewaite Manor.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An oompah land retelling of the Rumplestiltskein story.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: From the security of his treehouse, Tom wages battle with Spike and Jerry.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get hold of an old pinball machine and install it in the cabin. Their furious party interrupts Grizzys nap and the bear threatens to break the contraption.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy, a big chocolate lover, is growing a young cacao tree under an ultraviolet lamp. During a trampoline session, the Lemmings accidentally break the lamp, provoking a supernatural reaction.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: During a fight, Grizzy and the Lemmings stumble upon a Mayan temple lost in the jungle. Once inside, they set off a magic reaction that creates doubles of themselves at different ages. They now have a Grizzy babe and elderly Lemmings. Grizzy tries to get the young bear interested in a documentary on salmon, while the Lemmings want to initiate their ancestors to dance. But age differences are not so easily defeated.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Short on food supplies, Grizzy has gone out to gather fruit. He comes back with a basketful but discovers that the Lemmings have stolen the last of the chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take off with the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread. Grizzy catches up with them but they drop the jar and it lands in a nearby sacred temple. Grizzy and the Lemmings must solve riddles along the path to the Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize wrestling combats on the living room couch. Grizzy, weary of the clamor, stops the match. The displeased Lemmings retaliate, but during their fight the cabins wood floor caves in and they all fall into an old sidecar!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When Mayor Foghorn Leghorn hires The Looney Builders to build a lighthouse for Looneyburg, Lola’s tablet breaks and she must rely on herself.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders redesign the last hole of the ACME Acres miniature golf course. Porky is determined to make it just right for the children who will play on it.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Beaver Brothers hire The Looney Builders to build them a log cabin, but soon sidetrack the job by goofing around too much.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a skate park for the kids, but it soon interferes with Hoots Talon and his friends’ activities. / The Looney Builders face underwater challenges as they build a sea school for Moxie Manatee.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build Kathy Bat an upside-down radio station, Porky has concerns but doesn’t speak up.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After agreeing to swap motherboards and change bodies, the Batwheels have to quickly learn to “drive a mile in each other’s wheels” in time to stop the approaching Legion of Zoom!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has some competition with Nightwing’s motorcycle, Nightbike. These stunt bikes will need to learn that they’re better when they work together. / After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Ducky and Quizz steal the Bat-Signal’s one-of-a-kind lightbulb, Bam and Batwing must find a way to restore the legendary light so Batman knows when Gotham needs him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Kitty is staying over at the Batcave for a sleepover, but getting her to lie down for a catnap is no easy task as the Batwheels have to find creative ways to get her to sleep.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird learns a lesson in asking for permission when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking. When the stuffed animal accidentally gets swiped by the Legion of Zoom, Redbird will have to rescue the stuffed unicorn or admit to Buff what he did.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is covered in super bouncy Bounce X goo during a chase with Prank, he must learn to use his newfound bouncing abilities to his advantage. / Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as he’s tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Squirm asks Manny to magic up an ice cream to help him cool down in the hot sun. But Squirm’s eyes are bigger than his belly…or are they??

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at the supermarket when he spots a cool fire engine ride – but the security guard makes it clear it’s for little kids only. Not to be deterred, Mr Bean tries everything he can to distract the guard to have his go on the ride. When he finally does get his go, it’s not as good as he thought it would be, especially when a real fire engine has to be called to help Mr Bean!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean receives a delivery of a bunch of flowers for Mrs Wicket, but accidentally runs them over in the his car. He can’t afford to replace them, so he decides to recreate the bunch by taking flowers one by one from anywhere he can - a vase in a cafe, a wedding bouquet, even from between the teeth of a tango dancer! But will he assemble the bunch and be back in time for Mrs Wicket?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets so engrossed playing with Mr Paliwal’s new drone that he doesn’t notice a car thief stealing his car. They quickly jump into Mr Paliwal’s car and use the drone to track the stolen car to the thief’s warehouse hideout. Using the drone, they discover a criminal car-stealing operation – but will they be able to outwit the car thieves using Mr Paliwal’s flying gadget?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is dragging a very bored Mr Bean around a shopping centre when he spots a competition for Minty Mints – pull your silliest face for a photo and win a cash prize! Mr Bean tries to queue but it’s too long - so he persuades Irma to visit a photo studio offering romantic photoshoots. Can Mr Bean get away with pulling funny faces and submit the photo to the Minty Mints people without Irma knowing?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Scrapper claws a rip in Teddy, Mr Bean rushes him to the Teddy hospital. As Teddy is being fixed, Mr Bean is rather taken with another Ted on sale in the shop. He decided to take Big Ted home with him once Teddy is fixed. But at home it seems as though Big Ted is freezing Teddy out, and after a particularly terrifying nightmare, Mr Bean realises he has to get rid of his new guest.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush really wants to get over his fear of snakes. Truff really wants to get over his fear of ants. So they team up to help each other overcome their fears ... maybe.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mushpot offers to look after the Mushies so Mushpie can get a well-earned rest. He thinks it will be easy. It is not easy! The Mushies end up pushing both Mushpot and Starmush to their limit.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Sushi-Mushi’s excitement and pride over Chanterelle doing a portrait of him to hang in his restaurant turns to worry. What if his friends don’t like it? But, of course, Chanterelle would never let that happen.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Wanting to show the Mushies that they should fly high and follow their dreams, Mushpie starts leaf-gliding for the first time.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Puff wants to impress Sushi-Mushi by showing him how he can use his fog to steam food. But Sushi-Mushi thinks Puff wants to be his cooking rival!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and Lilit discover that each of them has a favourite beetle. This is great! They’re beetle buddies! However this quickly turns into a competition on who has the ‘best’ beetle...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings find a native American Indian vase with a genie inside that will make anyones dreams come true, if they only let him out by rubbing the vase. There is nonetheless one little snag: the effects of the genies magic instantly wear off as soon as he returns to his vase and the lid shuts.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get their hands on a secret weapon that belongs to the Canadian Army: anyone hit with it becomes non-violent. They use the arm to transform Grizzy into a cherub, despite himself.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super fun app that allows you to see yourself as a rabbit or a robot or else decked out with lots of animated accessories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When they find a book on Japanese origami, the Lemmings churn out paper birds to play gliding games. Grizzy realizes that he could make the butterfly on the cover for his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are all lined up on the couch to watch a cartoon film where a mouse plays nasty tricks on a cat. Grizzy, who has decided to take his nap, switches off the TV and confiscates the batteries of the remote control to make sure they cant switch their program back on. But is it wise to frustrate a gang of Lemmings whove been inspired by a gag-filled cartoon?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Once again, Grizzy shows the Lemmings that they just dont measure up to him physically and that the last jar of chocolate spread is for the strongest. The Lemmings find a way around this by increasing the power of a lamp that accelerates plant growth and instantly expand themselves to... bear size.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings lay their hands on a full crate of chocolate spread, which they hide somewhere behind Grizzys back. And since the Lemmings are both prudent and cunning, its impossible to surprise them when they pay a visit to their secret hoard. Until the day Grizzy discovers a magic ring that enables him to take on the appearance of a Lemming.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that hes discovered the ultimate gadget for good living: a pair of connected glasses for watching TV in panoramic view, with all sorts of indicators, namely an intrusion warning signal. There is only one real drawback: the speedometer function which the Lemmings adore.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings clamor for their turn to play with the rangers mobile phone, but Grizzy isnt in the sharing mood. And hes very talented at flattening anything that comes near, without looking up from his game. The Lemmings invent an implacable protection system which should enable them to recover the mobile in complete safety.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is captivated by a mime artist on TV who makes viewers believe in the presence of an invisible wall. To get rid of the Lemmings, who have sights on his jar of Yummy, Grizzy hides the jar and pretends he has an invisible one. When the Lemmings see through the trick, they decide to trap Grizzy with a grand illusion number.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wicket’s beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.desc: CNBC is on assignment in Macao as the NBA makes its high stakes return to China after an absence of over 5 years. Its a business play with global implications. Emily Tan speaks to some of the players behind the leagues China comeback.

programme.title: CNBC Conversation
programme.desc: CNBC heads to Baghdad for a conversation with Iraqs Prime Minister, Mohammed Shia Al-Sudani just weeks before his country heads to the polls. Dan Murphy speaks to the PM about Baghdads balancing act, between Iran and the United States and the major oil producers future as crude prices hover around $60 per barrel.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Jason Derek Brown looks like a wealthy mellow surfer dude, but hes allegedly a stone-cold killer who shoots a security guard five times in the head to steal $56,000 in cash. Authorities say Brown robs an armored car guard to fuel his corrupt playboy lifestyle. This serial con artist leads the FBI on a heart-pumping chase over several western states and lands on the FBIs Most Wanted list.

programme.title: Arts unveiled
programme.desc: Who was Jose Protacio Rizal — and why is he honored every December 30th on Rizal Day in the Philippines? Born in 1861 on the island of Luzon, Rizal was more than just a writer. He was a visionary reformer, a trained physician, and a fearless critic of Spanish colonial rule.

programme.title: Planet A
programme.desc: Many cities around the world dedicate insane amounts of space to parking. programme.title: Shed And Buried: Classic Cars

programme.desc: Mike and Elvis are going global! This time, the stakes are higher, the deadlines tighter and the motor transformations are more jaw-dropping than ever.

programme.title: Tuuri
programme.desc: Kun Isa vie Blueyn ja Bingon vaunuretkelle puistoon aikaisin aamulla, Bluey ei malta odottaa paastakseen rakkaalle kiipeilytelineelleen. Karsivallisyys joutuu kuitenkin koetukselle, kun Isa pysahtyy juttelemaan ystaviensa kanssa. Turhautunut Bluey keskeyttaa aikuisten keskustelut. Isa kaskee olemaan kohtelias, mutta vasta kun han huomaa Bingon leikkivan onnellisena, han tajuaa itsekin voivansa leikkia. Kun Isa seuraavan kerran pysahtyy juttelemaan bussipysakin lahelle, Bluey kehittaa Bingon kanssa oman bussileikkinsa ja houkuttelee Isankin mukaan. Kun kiire on ohi, Bluey rentoutuu ja nauttii matkasta.

programme.title: Tuuri
programme.desc: Kun aiti menee yksinaan kavelylle rannalle, Bluey juoksee hanet kiinni nayttakseen loytamaansa simpukankuorta. Teeskennellessaan merenneitoa, joka viimein sai jalat, han lahtee seikkailulle yksinaan, seuraten aidin jalanjalkia rantaviivaa pitkin. Matkalla han nakee surffaajan, arsyttavia lokkeja, parven rapuja, ikaantyneen meduusan seka ison ja hermostuneen pelikaanin. Saatuaan ensikosketuksen itsenaiseen elamaan, Bluey liittyy taas aidin seuraan ja kuuntelevat simpukankuorta ennen kuin kavelevat takaisin rantaa pitkin.

programme.title: Sport
programme.desc: Spordiuudised

programme.title: Esimene stuudio
programme.desc: Saatesari avab erinevaid paevakajalisi teemasid, mis sunnivad meie igapaeva-elust, alates poliitikast ja majandusest, lõpetades sotsiaalia ning kultuuriga. Saatejuhid Andres Kuusk, Johannes Tralla, Mirko Ojakivi. Režissoor Maarika Lauri, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Meie õpetajad
programme.desc: Uue saatesarja esimeses osas raagime Anna Vesperiga, kes tootab Tallinna Vabaduse koolis, kus õpetab eesti keelt Ukraina lastele. Anna on endine tervishoiutootaja, kuid paar aastat tagasi tegi ta oma karjaaris põhjaliku kannapoorde. Teda innustab soov anda oma panus haridusse, ajal, mil Eestis tuntakse teravat õpetajate puudust. Saatejuht Uljana Kuzmina, režissoor Marten Vaher, toimetaja Jevgenia Volohhonskaja, produtsent Egle Beek.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby
programme.desc: Giles Coren ja Monica Galetti tutvuvad ainulaadse hotelliga, kus kaelkirjakud, tootajad ja kulalised elavad Nairobi rahvuspargis asuvas mõisahoones kulg kulje kõrval. Kaelkirjakud isegi einestavad koos inimestega.

programme.title: Pealtnagija
programme.desc: Kaheosaline dokumentaal, mis jutustab, kuidas nõukogude ajal Eesti NSV naiste murdmaakoondise juures alustanud usinast ja uuenduslikust eesti treenerist sai rahvusvahelise murdmaasuusatamise uks mõjukam ning tuntum spetsialist, kes tõstis sportlasi olumpiapjedestaalidele, aga havitas ka karjaare. Ta palvis tunnustust, auhindu ja kiitust, aga pettis samal ajal keeruliste kombinatsioonidega dopingukontrolle, sponsoreid ning spordisõpru. "Mati Alaver - valgusest varju" on traagiline lugu poorasest vaimustusest ja rangast pettumusest, mille telgitagustes peitub palju pooltoone ning fakte, mida uldsus esimest korda kuuleb. Autor-stsenarist Mihkel Karmas, režissoorid Raivo Maripuu, Vladlen Pobjaržin, toimetajad Kristjan Pihl, Taavi Eilat, Merilin Parli, Uljana Kuzmina, produtsent Piret Priisaar.

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Suur võidusõit. Lancia Audi vastu
programme.desc: Film 1983. aasta autoralli maailmameistrivõistlustest, mis tegi revolutsiooni autospordis. Suureparane naitlejaansambel aitab vaatajatel tunda sedasama adrenaliinitulva, mida tundsid toona ralli pealtvaatajad. 51. Monte Carlo ralli osutus maailma kõige võistluslikumaks ja ohtlikumaks spordisundmuseks. See oli kahe auahne firma, kahe filosoofia, kahe legendaarse titaani Audi ja Lancia jõuproov, roolis maailma parimad rallisõitjad.

programme.title: OP
programme.desc: Iganadalane kultuurikompass! Saatejuht Owe Petersell võtab vaataja kaasa kinno, teatrisse, naitusele, raamatupoodi, kontserdile ja mujalegi. Režissoor Antti Hakli, toimetajad Ave-Marleen Rei ja Ave Lutter.

programme.title: Kultuuri kodu
programme.desc: Kultuuri kodu on koht kõigile Eesti kirjanikele, muusikutele, kunstnikele, arhitektidele, disaineritele, teatri- ja filmiinimestele. See on ruumikas pesapaik, kuhu mahuvad kõik kenasti ara ja head kultuuri pole ju kunagi liiga palju. Eesti Kultuurkapitali sajanda juubeli puhul koputame kultuuri kodu uksele ja vaatame, kes neist meie aega ja ruumi kujundavatest loojatest parajasti kodus juhtub olema. Luhiportreede sarja režissoor on Erle Veber, tekste kirjutab Urmas Vadi ja loeb Marika Vaarik, arhiivis toimetab Ruth Alakula, kaamerat juhib Manuel Magi ning mikrofoni hoiab Mart Kessel-Otsa.

programme.title: Kommentaare Eesti filmile
programme.desc: Priit Parn ja Janno Põldma sissejuhatus oma animafilmile vendade Auguste ja Louis Lumière elust.

Animafilm "1895" on puhendatud filmikunsti 100. aastapaevale. Film vendade August ja Louis Lumiereide elust, mis kasitleb uldsusele seni tundmatuid fakte ning sundmusi kahe kuulsa venna, kes on lainud ajalukku kui kinematograafia leiutajad, elust. Film on illusioon. Kas illusioon on tõde? See vaide ja kusimus olid aluseks autoritele, kui nad võtsid endale õiguse kinnitada, et just nende versioon vendade Lumiereide elust ning filmikunsti sunnist on seni teadaolevatest kõige originaalsem ja ainulaadsem. Rohkete auhindadega parjatud filmi lavastasid Priit Parn ja Janno Põldma.

programme.title: Hercule Poirot
programme.desc: Maailmarahu toetuseks korraldatakse rahvusvaheline vastuvõtt, mille tipuks on malematš eaka vene suurmeistriga. Paraku sureb malesuurmeister otse malelaua taga ja ajakirjanduses ilmuvad lood salaparasest Suurest Nelikust. Poirotgi hakkab uurima poliitilisi telgitaguseid, kuid taipab peagi, et mõrvar tegutseb marksa isiklikumatel motiividel.

Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Kova laki: Erikoisyksikko
programme.desc: Television pisimpaan jatkuneen draamasarjan, "Kovan lain", luojalta ruutuun saapuu nyt vaikuttava sarja, joka kertoo New Yorkin poliisivoimien SVU-erityisyksikon elamasta ja tyosta. Kussakin jaksossa seuraamme rikosetsiva Elliot Stableria, Olivia Bensonia, John Munchia seka Odafin Tutuolaa, kun he yrittavat ratkaista kaupungin mutkikkaimpia rikoksia. He seuraavat kutakin johtolankaa, eivatka lepaa ennen kuin saavat oikeutta viattomille uhreille ja paljastavat totuuden.

programme.desc: Rikosdraamasarja kertoo seksuaalirikoksia tutkivan poliisiosaston toiminnasta New Yorkissa.

programme.title: Eyes Wide Shut
programme.desc: Arthur Schnitzlerin romaaniin perustuva draama tohtorista, joka erkanee vaimostaan yha syvemmalle pakkomielteisen seksin fantasioihin ja karuun todellisuuteen.Tama mestariteos jai Kubrickin viimeiseksi. Ohjaaja: Stanley Kubrick, USA 1999. (153). Paaosissa:Tom Cruise, Nicole Kidman, Madison Eginton, Jackie Sawiris, Sydney Pollack.

programme.title: Eyes Wide Shut
programme.desc: Arthur Schnitzlerin romaaniin perustuva draama tohtorista, joka erkanee vaimostaan yha syvemmalle pakkomielteisen seksin fantasioihin ja karuun todellisuuteen.Tama mestariteos jai Kubrickin viimeiseksi. programme.title: Kova laki: Erikoisyksikko
programme.desc: Rikosdraamasarja kertoo seksuaalirikoksia tutkivan poliisiosaston toiminnasta New Yorkissa.

programme.title: Kova laki: Erikoisyksikko
programme.desc: Rikosdraamasarja kertoo seksuaalirikoksia tutkivan poliisiosaston toiminnasta New Yorkissa.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Ruotsi 2.0
programme.desc: Haltian on aika arvata, kuka on salainen yksisarvinen. Yksi pareista lukitaan, ja ensimmaiset finaaliviikolle selviytyneet kilpailijat ovat selvilla. Ilkeat puheet aiheuttavat draamaa paratiisissa, ja kammottava noita saapuu sekoittamaan pakkaa.

programme.title: Huvila And Huussi
programme.desc: Nayttelija Ville Myllyrinteen ja hanen perheensa omistaman, 50-luvulla rakennetun mokin piha kaipaa kunnostusta. Mokilla on etenkin Villen vaimolle suurta tunnearvoa ja siita halutaan tehda selkea ja helppohoitoinen. Tanja ja Niko tekevat pihasta kaytannollisen kokonaisuuden, johon tulee kesakeittiota, kivikkoryhmia ja kunnostettuja kulkuja.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Ruotsi 2.0
programme.desc: Piparkakkutalosta paljastuu yllattava kuva, ja se jarisyttaa monia. Kauden viimeisessa Pandoran lippaassa kysellaan pahoja kysymyksia ja tehdaan tarkea valinta.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Ruotsi 2.0
programme.desc: Toinen punahilkoista loytaa sangysta suden ja joutuu poistumaan. Pariseremoniassa ratkeaa, ketka etenevat finaaliviikolle. Seremonian jalkeen haetaan asetelmia viimeiselle viikolle.

programme.title: Maryn helpot kokkailut
programme.desc: Tyopaivan lounas ei aina ole maistuva tai terveellinen. Nyt on! Mary loi ihania resepteja lounasta piristamaan. Teemme leipia sienilla ja pavuilla, terveellisen tahinibowlin, rocky road -patukoita ja sobanuudelikaaryleita. Lounas ei ole koskaan ollut maistuvampi!

programme.title: Korkeasaari
programme.desc: Kevaan ensimmaiset poikaset ovat syntyneet Korkeasaaressa, ja valkoposkihanhien pesimiset tyollistavat hanhioppaita. Jonne tayttaa tiikereiden vesialtaan ensi kertaa talven jaljilta, joten pennuilla riittaa ihmeteltavaa.

programme.title: Burgerimiehet Valimerella
programme.desc: Kestaako kamelin selka? Akselin ja Ossin Afrikan seikkailu jatkuu Marokon kuumalla aavikolla. Salainen reitti johtaa ravitsevalta keitaalta toiselle ja villi laulu raikuu beduiiniteltan hamyssa.

programme.title: Top Gear Suomi
programme.desc: Parjaako Lada Wartburgille kiihdytyskisassa ja onko moderni itaauto uhka vai mahdollisuus. Teemu, Ismo ja Christoffer ottavat selvaa, mita itaautoille kuuluu ennen ja tanaan. Christoffer ja Stig kayvat treffeilla meksikolaisen kehonrakentajan BMW M2 kanssa, ja studiossa kiistaa aiheuttaa cool wall. Vieraana F1 toimittaja Mervi Kallio.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Anthonyn serkku on ajautunut jalleen vaikeuksiin. Frank ihmettelee vanhan ystavansa salamyhkaisyytta. Kukkalahetys saa Baezin pelkaamaan vapautuneen vangin kostoa.

programme.title: Farmi Suomi: Revanssi
programme.desc: Kaksitoista kilpailijaa palaa Farmille, missa heita odottaa seka ensimmainen tehtava etta kullalla vuorattu yllatys, joka saa puntit tutisemaan. Kilpailu alkaa voimakkaana ja heti ensimmaisen jakson paatteeksi yksi joutuu kotimatkalle. Ohjelman juontaa Susanna Laine.

programme.title: Amerikan rajavartijat
programme.desc: Kausi 3. Jakso 8/20. Kasseittain ruokaa. Laukut taynna ruokaa saapuvat turistit tyollistavat maatalousasiantuntijoita. Intialainen pappi joutuu tarkempaan syyniin rukoilukeikkansa vuoksi. Amerikkalainen realitysarja.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Ruotsi 2.0
programme.desc: Piparkakkutalosta paljastuu yllattava kuva, ja se jarisyttaa monia. Kauden viimeisessa Pandoran lippaassa kysellaan pahoja kysymyksia ja tehdaan tarkea valinta.

programme.title: Paratiisihotelli Ruotsi 2.0
programme.desc: Toinen punahilkoista loytaa sangysta suden ja joutuu poistumaan. Pariseremoniassa ratkeaa, ketka etenevat finaaliviikolle. Seremonian jalkeen haetaan asetelmia viimeiselle viikolle.

programme.title: Huvila And Huussi
programme.desc: Fiskarsissa sijaitsevasta, lahes sata vuotta vanhasta pystyhirsimokista muotoutuu Mikon ja Villen kasissa idyllinen design-kohde. Muotoilijan omistaman mokin sisatilat uusitaan vanhaa kunnioittaen ja harvinaiset pystyhirret otetaan esiin. Tanja ja Niko kutsutaan apuun, silla myos pihaan tehdaan muutoksia.

programme.title: Huvila And Huussi
programme.desc: Vanhan, sympaattisen siirtolapuutarhapalstan tuoreet omistajat kaipaavat pihaan toiminnallisia ja visuaalisia elementteja. Tontille on rakennettu uusi mokki, mutta varsinainen piha on ajanpuutteen takia jaanyt vahemmalle huomiolle. Tanja ja Niko loihtivat pihaan rustic gardenin, johon tulee mm. erityisen monikayttoinen varasto seka kasvihuone.

programme.title: Huvila And Huussi
programme.desc: Perheen suurista remonttisuunnitelmista huolimatta heidan mokilleen ei ole tehty mitaan lahes 20 vuoteen. Mikko ja Ville tulevat paikalle ja laittavat kaiken kerralla kuntoon. Keittio uusitaan taysin ja vanha savuttava takka korjataan. Myos makuuhuoneita jarjestellaan uusiksi ja mokin synkahko yleisilme kohotetaan kauttaaltaan pirteammaksi.

programme.title: Huvila And Huussi
programme.desc: Nayttelija Ville Myllyrinteen ja hanen perheensa omistaman, 50-luvulla rakennetun mokin piha kaipaa kunnostusta. Mokilla on etenkin Villen vaimolle suurta tunnearvoa ja siita halutaan tehda selkea ja helppohoitoinen. Tanja ja Niko tekevat pihasta kaytannollisen kokonaisuuden, johon tulee kesakeittiota, kivikkoryhmia ja kunnostettuja kulkuja.

programme.title: Burgerimiehet Valimerella
programme.desc: Elakoon valimerellinen ruokavalio!. Uusi kausi alkaa! Nalkaiset burgerimiehet Akseli Herlevi ja Ossi Lahtinen starttaavat suurelle Valimeren kiertomatkalle loytoretkeilijoiden Portugalista. Se on portviinia ja puita!

programme.title: Burgerimiehet Valimerella
programme.desc: Akselin ja Ossin valimerellinen ruokavalio taydentyy Espanjassa ilmakuivatulla vuoristokinkulla, flamencolla, vermutilla ja Sevillan parturilla. Se on kutosta tupaan, tapasta eteen ja vamos!

programme.title: Burgerimiehet Valimerella
programme.desc: He syovat kuin leijonat ja juovat kuin kamelit! Burgerimiehet seilaavat Valimeren yli Afrikkaan ja kutosta pyytaa. Tuhannen ja yhden yon seikkailuissa kohdataan salaperainen kaunotar Sara Chafak.

programme.title: Burgerimiehet Valimerella
programme.desc: Kestaako kamelin selka? Akselin ja Ossin Afrikan seikkailu jatkuu Marokon kuumalla aavikolla. Salainen reitti johtaa ravitsevalta keitaalta toiselle ja villi laulu raikuu beduiiniteltan hamyssa.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny ja Baez lyottaytyvat yhteen Dannyn vanhan tyoparin Jackie Curatolan kanssa loytaakseen jaljittelijamurhaajan, joka jaljittelee vanhoja murhia aiemmasta tapauksesta.

programme.title: Farmi Suomi: Revanssi
programme.desc: Farmiarki on loytanyt uomansa, mutta pinnan alla kytee kaikkien aikojen kaksintaistelu, jossa otetaan mittaa niin menneisyyden haamuista kuin itseen uskomisen ulottuvuuksista. Peli on alkanut ja se yllattaa jokaisen kilpailijan totaalisesti.

programme.title: Amerikan rajavartijat
programme.desc: Kausi 3. Jakso 9/20. Ollako vai eiko olla?. Meksikolaisnaisen parisuhdekuviot aiheuttavat paanvaivaa. Kanadasta saapuu mies, joka suorastaan sateilee. Amerikkalainen realitysarja.

programme.title: Top Gear Suomi
programme.desc: Uusi jakso! Teemu Selanne pistaa viheriot rullalle yrittaessaan paeta Suomen puolustusvoimien erikoisjoukkoja tayssahkoisella G-mallin Mercedes-Benz-maastoautolla. Lisaksi juontajat hammastelevat autojen lisavarusteiden hinnoittelua ja paattavat saastaa asentamalla luksusvarusteet itse. Vieraana OnlyFans-tahti Susanna Penttila.

programme.title: Re-Formation
programme.desc: Rattfardiggjord genom tron allena. Docent Anders Gerdmar.

programme.title: John Fenn - Hur du forandrar ditt liv?
programme.desc: Nya tankar och vanor. John Fenn fortsatter om hur vi genom Kristus kan overvinna gamla vanor och svagheter, och vandra i nya tankegångar. Sarskilt pekar han på vagar ut ur synder som vår gamla manniska alskar.

programme.title: Trofast till slutet
programme.desc: Sok Guds hjarta. Karleken gor oss uthålliga. Andrew Brunson beskriver hur hans hunger efter att soka och lara kanna Guds hjarta var det som forberedde honom bast infor provningarna.

programme.title: Jag motte Messias
programme.desc: Tvåtusen år av logner. "Jag var chockad! I tvåtusen år har de ljugit for mitt folk!"Se Suzies berattelse, en israelisk judinna som kom till tro på att Jesus (Jeshua) ar Messias!

programme.title: Nya Testamentet oppnas
programme.desc: Filipperbrevet 2/2 och Brevet till Filemon. Paulus pekar på valen som format Jesu karaktar och utmanar till en livsstil i Jesu efterfoljd. Filemon ar ett exempel på fralsningen omsatt i praktik. Onesimus tar itu med sitt forflutna.

programme.title: Rakt på sak med Ingemar Helmner
programme.desc: Hur lange ska vi vanta?. Det kan vara bra att vanta in Guds tid. Men evangeliet galler inte morgondagen utan idag, nu. Det insåg 1800-talets stora predikanter och det var den kallelse som drev deras fotter ut over vattnet.

programme.title: Antisemitismen: Från ursprung till nutid
programme.desc: Frankrike och Dreyfusaffaren. Prof. Pierre Birnbaum undersoker antisemitismens utveckling i 1800-talets Frankrike samt den okanda Dreyfusaffaren.

programme.title: Bibelstudie med Baruch Korman
programme.desc: Baal-Peor. Baruch Korman undervisar från Hos 9:10-10:5 om Israel som gick från att vara som druvor i oknen till att inviga sig åt skammens gud i Baal-Peor och om foljderna av att kranka andliga principer.

programme.title: Kungen kommer
programme.desc: Vilddjuret - hur visar det sig?. Strax innan Messias kommer får Satan styra over jorden en kort tid. Det sker genom ett “vilddjur” som beskrivs på olika satt. Är det en person, ett rike, ett totalitart system, eller alla tre?

programme.title: TV7 Israelnyheter
programme.desc: TV7 Israelnyheter

programme.title: Bibliska nycklar till helande
programme.desc: Hur kan mina boner bidra till mitt helande?. Vilken plats har mina boner i min resa mot helande och upprattelse? Gor det någon skillnad om jag ber eller ej, och har det någon betydelse hur jag ber?

programme.title: LUMO - Lukasevangeliet
programme.desc: Lukas 4:1-44. Dramatisering av evangelietexten på svenska. Jesus frestas. Jesus i Nasarets synagoga. Jesus i Kapernaum.

programme.title: Israel talar
programme.desc: Israel, hårt trangd av den islamska varlden. Staten Israel har fått kampa for sin existens alltsedan den grundades år 1948.

programme.title: Gershon Nerels Israel
programme.desc: Relationen mellan Israel och muslimvarlden 1/2. Israel i Guds plan.

programme.title: Letters
programme.desc: Varfor lamnade du mig, pappa?. Esther Bergmans pappa lamnade familjen nar hon var sex år. Esther vaxte upp och blev utåt sett en glad tjej, men inom henne stannade ett smartsamt tomrum som forvandlades till social fobi.

programme.title: Cafe Bibeln Uppsala
programme.desc: Hur kan vi som kristna påverka samhallet. Cafe Bibeln gastas av Johan Candelin, ledare for Martyrkyrkans Vanner.

programme.desc: Rattfardiggjord genom tron allena. Docent Anders Gerdmar.

programme.title: Cafe Bibeln Uppsala
programme.desc: Hur kan vi som kristna påverka samhallet. Cafe Bibeln gastas av Johan Candelin, ledare for Martyrkyrkans Vanner.

programme.title: Kungadomets vind
programme.desc: Sagan om två stater. Varldsledare planerar en palestinsk stat i Judeen och Samarien. Den har tvåstatslosningen tas trots det inte på allvar varken av palestinier eller judar på Vastbanken.

programme.title: Gebetshaus Augsburg - Vortrag von Dr. Johannes Hartl - Jesaja
programme.desc: Är vår moteskultur biblisk?. Gud vill bygga sin helgedom och bo mitt ibland sitt folk! Är våra gudstjanster utformade enligt Bibelns modell så att de ger utrymme for den Helige Andes kraft och verk? Kenneth Witick undervisar.

programme.title: I framsatet
programme.desc: Åke Samuelsson – storst av allt ar karleken. Åke var så fast i missbruk att lakarna hade gett upp hoppet och ville sjukpensionera honom innan han fyllt 20. Men Gud kallade andra att be for Åke och till slut brot karleken och sanningen igenom.

programme.title: Jerusalemnytt med Sartola
programme.desc: Tisdag 4/11 2025. Långt till fred i Gaza.Qatar fordomde Hamas.Inrikespolitisk utnamningskris i Israel.

programme.title: Nar borjar livet
programme.desc: Abortfrågan i EU. Fd EU-parlamentarikern Lennart Sacredeus behandlar frågan om hur man ser på abortfrågan ur ett europeiskt perspektiv.

programme.title: Ursprung
programme.desc: Darwin. Goran Schmidt talar om att Charles Darwin inte var forst med evolutionsteorierna, de fanns ett par tusen år fore honom.

programme.title: Guldkorn - Tillsammans ber vi
programme.desc: Tungan har makt over dod och liv. Våra ord kan ha storre effekt an vi tror. Att med sin tunga befasta och tala ut negativa domar over sig sjalv eller andra kan få andliga konsekvenser. Nancy Edberg – ur Tillsammans ber vi LIVE 66.

programme.title: Derek Prince
programme.desc: Fri från forbannelsen 4/4. I detta avsnitt visar Derek Prince hur obibliska forbund, frimureri, haxdoktorer och avgudaforemål binder dig till forbannelse. Han visar också vagen till befrielse samt leder dig i en befrielsebon.

programme.title: Vetlanda Friforsamling - Vackelsemote
programme.desc: Lyft blicket - skorden ar mogen. Vackelsepredikan av Per-Arne Imsen. Gud har gett oss andliga vapen att bryta ner fasten som reser sig mot kunskapen om Gud. Materialismen ska brytas ner och skorden bargas.

programme.title: Är Forsta Moseboken historia?
programme.desc: Experterna svarar. Hur ser framtiden ut for kreationismen? Del Tackett samtalar med några av filmens experter om vetenskapens natur och auktoritet, sokandet efter sanning och problemen med en teistisk evolutionssyn.

programme.title: TV7 Israelnyheter
programme.desc: TV7 Israelnyheter

programme.title: Guds loften - Israels sakerhet
programme.desc: Guds loften - Israels sakerhet

programme.title: Teologi och ledarskap
programme.desc: Langtan efter det heliga 2/3. Helighet ar ett centralt – men ofta missforstått – begrepp i det kristna livet. I detta avsnitt lagger David Ekerbring, Olof Edsinger och Simon Ahlstrand fokus på langtan efter det heliga i samtalet.

programme.title: Parforhållande
programme.desc: Från trasig till hel. Tiu var en kanslig ung kvinna, som foralskade sig i bohemen Lauri. Hans kreativitet och begåvning tilltalade henne. Lauris bullrande livsstil forandrades genom en vans omskakande upplevelse. Också Tiu blev helad från tidigare handelser.

programme.title: Open Doors - I forfoljelsens spår
programme.desc: En dag var pappa borta. Två kulor avslutade Plinios liv. Han hade predikat om Jesus i ett område i Colombia dar kriminella gang harjade. Open Doors hjalpte hans son Sebastian, dottern Daniela och hustrun Alba att få traumarådgivning.

programme.title: Ordets parlor
programme.desc: Levande offer. Vad betyder det att helhjartat bara fram sig sjalv som ett levande offer till Gud? Miisu Piipari undervisar.

programme.title: Kungadomets vind
programme.desc: Sagan om två stater. Varldsledare planerar en palestinsk stat i Judeen och Samarien. Den har tvåstatslosningen tas trots det inte på allvar varken av palestinier eller judar på Vastbanken.

programme.title: Gebetshaus Augsburg - Vortrag von Dr. Johannes Hartl - Jesaja
programme.desc: Är vår moteskultur biblisk?. Gud vill bygga sin helgedom och bo mitt ibland sitt folk! Är våra gudstjanster utformade enligt Bibelns modell så att de ger utrymme for den Helige Andes kraft och verk? Kenneth Witick undervisar.

programme.title: I framsatet
programme.desc: Åke Samuelsson – storst av allt ar karleken. Åke var så fast i missbruk att lakarna hade gett upp hoppet och ville sjukpensionera honom innan han fyllt 20. Men Gud kallade andra att be for Åke och till slut brot karleken och sanningen igenom.

programme.title: Jerusalemnytt med Sartola
programme.desc: Tisdag 4/11 2025. Långt till fred i Gaza.Qatar fordomde Hamas.Inrikespolitisk utnamningskris i Israel.

programme.title: Nar borjar livet
programme.desc: Abortfrågan i EU. Fd EU-parlamentarikern Lennart Sacredeus behandlar frågan om hur man ser på abortfrågan ur ett europeiskt perspektiv.

programme.title: Ursprung
programme.desc: Darwin. Goran Schmidt talar om att Charles Darwin inte var forst med evolutionsteorierna, de fanns ett par tusen år fore honom.

programme.title: Guldkorn - Tillsammans ber vi
programme.desc: Tungan har makt over dod och liv. Våra ord kan ha storre effekt an vi tror. Att med sin tunga befasta och tala ut negativa domar over sig sjalv eller andra kan få andliga konsekvenser. Nancy Edberg – ur Tillsammans ber vi LIVE 66.

programme.title: Derek Prince
programme.desc: Fri från forbannelsen 4/4. I detta avsnitt visar Derek Prince hur obibliska forbund, frimureri, haxdoktorer och avgudaforemål binder dig till forbannelse. Han visar också vagen till befrielse samt leder dig i en befrielsebon.

programme.title: Vetlanda Friforsamling - Vackelsemote
programme.desc: Lyft blicket - skorden ar mogen. Vackelsepredikan av Per-Arne Imsen. Gud har gett oss andliga vapen att bryta ner fasten som reser sig mot kunskapen om Gud. Materialismen ska brytas ner och skorden bargas.

programme.title: Är Forsta Moseboken historia?
programme.desc: Experterna svarar. Hur ser framtiden ut for kreationismen? Del Tackett samtalar med några av filmens experter om vetenskapens natur och auktoritet, sokandet efter sanning och problemen med en teistisk evolutionssyn.

programme.title: TV7 Israelnyheter
programme.desc: TV7 Israelnyheter

programme.title: Guds loften - Israels sakerhet
programme.desc: Guds loften - Israels sakerhet

programme.title: Teologi och ledarskap
programme.desc: Langtan efter det heliga 2/3. Helighet ar ett centralt – men ofta missforstått – begrepp i det kristna livet. I detta avsnitt lagger David Ekerbring, Olof Edsinger och Simon Ahlstrand fokus på langtan efter det heliga i samtalet.

programme.title: Parforhållande
programme.desc: Från trasig till hel. Tiu var en kanslig ung kvinna, som foralskade sig i bohemen Lauri. Hans kreativitet och begåvning tilltalade henne. Lauris bullrande livsstil forandrades genom en vans omskakande upplevelse. Också Tiu blev helad från tidigare handelser.

programme.title: Open Doors - I forfoljelsens spår
programme.desc: En dag var pappa borta. Två kulor avslutade Plinios liv. Han hade predikat om Jesus i ett område i Colombia dar kriminella gang harjade. Open Doors hjalpte hans son Sebastian, dottern Daniela och hustrun Alba att få traumarådgivning.

programme.title: Ordets parlor
programme.desc: Levande offer. Vad betyder det att helhjartat bara fram sig sjalv som ett levande offer till Gud? Miisu Piipari undervisar.

programme.title: Ordets parlor
programme.desc: Levande offer. Vad betyder det att helhjartat bara fram sig sjalv som ett levande offer till Gud? Miisu Piipari undervisar.

programme.title: Israel talar
programme.desc: Arabers och judars samexistens. Varldsmedia berattar ofta om sammandrabbningar mellan judar och araber. Man kan få intrycket att dessa folkgrupper inte formår koexistera. Verkligheten ar en annan.

programme.title: Det ar overnaturligt!
programme.desc: Sid Roths gast i programmet ar Shane Warren 2. Shane blev som 12-åring uppryckt till himlen, och fick i sju timmar se in i den andliga varlden. Denna upplevelse forandrade hans liv totalt.

programme.title: Att hora Guds rost
programme.desc: Varfor hor jag inget?. Man vill folja Gud och man forsoker lyssna till Hans rost ... Men inget hander. Varfor hor jag ingenting? Med Christer Dahlberg och Louise Gustafsson.

programme.title: Boneskola
programme.desc: Det yttersta redskapet - Fasta och bon. Jehova Tsevaot – Harskarornas Gud. Nar Jesus, Nehemja och olika ledare i Bibeln fastade såg de Guds kraft och stor forandring i svåra situationer. Jesus uppmanade oss till fasta och bon for att få genombrott.

programme.title: Cafe Bibeln Uppsala
programme.desc: Det anstotliga evangeliet. Varfor talar ingen langre om omvandelse, den yttersta domen, himmel och helvete? Mats Selander och Leif Nummela diskuterar frågan om vi har missat centrala delar av Bibelns budskap i dag.

programme.title: Pilgrim Media
programme.desc: Guds nåd. Dario Gjorushevski talar om varldens basta budskap - Guds nåd.

programme.title: Ersattningsteologi eller inympad?
programme.desc: Israel i Bibeln. Vad tycker dagens yngre generationer om Israel? Är deras åsikter grundade på Bibeln eller på den bild som dagens nyheter ger? Hor Jack Tommy diskutera tillsammans med Dan Johansson.

programme.title: Trons grunder med Åke Carlson
programme.desc: Fralsningsvisshet. Nar vi tar emot Jesus sker något djupt i vårt inre och vi fods på nytt. Vi kommer då inte att drabbas av Guds dom utan får medborgarskap i himlen. Åke Carlson undervisar om fralsningsvisshet.

programme.title: Letters
programme.desc: Jonna Gadd.

programme.title: TV7 Israelnyheter
programme.desc: TV7 Israelnyheter

programme.title: Två grannar
programme.desc: Framtidens evangelisation. Vi får besok av en gast som berattar om att delatron i sin vardag. Evangelisation har haft en central roll bland kristna genom historienmen vad innebar evangelisation och hur kan den se ut?

programme.title: Jag motte Messias
programme.desc: Randy Newman. Missnojd med livet borjade han soka efter svar genom religionen. Efter flera år av sokande hittade han till slut Jesus.

programme.title: Folk på Guds hjarta
programme.desc: Basker i Spanien. Mot lokala troende, Joxan och Nerea, och forsamlingsplanterarna Daniel och Marta. De valkomnar fler forebedjare och vanner till arbetet på baskiska.

programme.title: Ett liv
programme.desc: Jag var misslyckad. Stjarneleven Gracia sviker allas forvantningar genom att avbryta sina studier på ett respekterat universitet. Hur går hon vidare efter misslyckandet?

programme.title: Den andliga verkligheten
programme.desc: Sebastian och Stefan. Den frihet från morker han fått uppleva har gett eko i hela Sverige. Sebastian Stakset beskriver den andliga verkligheten utifrån sin egen vag till befrielse. Gast i forsta programmet ar Stefan Bjork.

programme.title: Israel talar
programme.desc: Arabers och judars samexistens. Varldsmedia berattar ofta om sammandrabbningar mellan judar och araber. Man kan få intrycket att dessa folkgrupper inte formår koexistera. Verkligheten ar en annan.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: River Huntersissa Rick ja jokietsintoihin erikoistunut Beau etsivat Britannian joista ja vesivaylista menneisyyden aarteita, jotka kertovat, miten esi-isamme elivat vaikkapa silloin, kun Rooma oli miehittanyt Britannian tai kun Ruusujen sota raivosi.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Äareton maailmankaikkeus on taynna outoja, rajuja ilmioita, kosmisia portteja lapi ajan ja paikan. Tutkijat etsivat valkoisia- ja mustia aukkoja, seka madonreikia.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Se on yksi maailman hienoimmista ja ihmeellisimmista rakennuksista. Mutta mika on totuus Taj Mahalista? Oliko siita olemassa myos mustasta marmorista rakennettu versio?

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Tahtijoukot ovat erinomainen tietolahde maailmankaikkeuden tahtien luonteesta ja monimuotoisuudesta.

programme.title: Muinaiset avaruusoliot
programme.desc: Monien eri kulttuurien kirjoituksissa kerrotaan samankaltaisista ylimaallisista, linnunomaisista olennoista, jotka tuhansia vuosia sitten toivat ihmiskunnalle edistyksellista laaketieteellista tietoa. Keita nama muinaiset kirurgit oikein olivat?

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: Jos ihmiset katoaisivat maapallolta, mita tapahtuisi metalliesineille? Romahtaisivatko sillat ja rakennukset? Ja mita tapahtuisi Yhdysvaltojen salaiselle kultakatkolle?

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Etelaisessa Kaliforniassa riehuvat maastopalot aiheuttavat leirintaalueella valtavan mutavyoryn, joka tappaa 14 ihmista. Tornado kay oklahomalaisen rekkakuskin kimppuun. Tulivuorenpurkaus Indonesiassa peittaa lahialueen asukkaat tuhkaan.

programme.title: The Search for the Tesla Files
programme.desc: Tutkija Marc Seifer loytaa ratkaisevan todisteen siita, etta Yhdysvaltain armeija halusi Teslan salaiset kansiot. Jason Stapleton ja Travis Taylor tutkivat yhteytta Teslan viimeisen patentin ja yhden ilmavoimien edistyneimman koneen valilla.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: River Huntersissa Rick ja jokietsintoihin erikoistunut Beau etsivat Britannian joista ja vesivaylista menneisyyden aarteita, jotka kertovat, miten esi-isamme elivat vaikkapa silloin, kun Rooma oli miehittanyt Britannian tai kun Ruusujen sota raivosi.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Kuu loistaa muita yotaivaan kappaleita kirkkaammin, mutta se on myos selvittamattomien mysteerien ja muinaisten myyttien lahde.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Ohjelman juontaja matkaa Kreikkaan tutkimaan, miten muinaisen Kreikan merenkulkutaidot kehittyivat. Han tarkastelee kuuluisan kolmisoutualuksen modernia versiota.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Maasta ammuttavista lasereista avaruuden halki kiitaviin puhelinpylvaan kokoisiin tankoihin ja kaukaisen tulevaisuuden huikaiseviin aseisiin—nyt otetaan selvaa avaruuden sodankaynnista.

programme.title: Muinaiset avaruusoliot
programme.desc: Arkeologit ovat loytaneet joka puolelta maailmaa salaperaisia reliikkeja, joita muinaiset kulttuurit ovat vaalineet tuhansia vuosia. Mika naissa muinaisissa esineissa viehattaa ihmisia?

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: Marty Lagina tapaa tutkija Kevin Dysktran, joka uskoo paikallistaneensa etelavaltioiden kulta-aarteen, joka makaa Lake Michigan -jarven pohjassa.

programme.title: Maanalaiset kaupungit
programme.desc: Kylman sodan aikaan Ukrainassa oli maailman kolmanneksi suurin ydinasekeskittyma maanalaisessa varastossa. Loyda rautaesiripun katkemat salaisuudet.

programme.title: Gold Hunters: Legend Of The Superstition Mountains
programme.desc: Kuolleiden kartta antaa tiimille seuraavan johtolangan, mutta edessa on Superstition-vuorten vaarallisin etappi. Eric tekee loydon, jonka ansiosta tutkimukset saavat aivan uuden suunnan.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: River Huntersissa Rick ja jokietsintoihin erikoistunut Beau etsivat Britannian joista ja vesivaylista menneisyyden aarteita, jotka kertovat, miten esi-isamme elivat vaikkapa silloin, kun Rooma oli miehittanyt Britannian tai kun Ruusujen sota raivosi.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Kuu loistaa muita yotaivaan kappaleita kirkkaammin, mutta se on myos selvittamattomien mysteerien ja muinaisten myyttien lahde.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Luomisen ja tuhon ahjo, Maa laidallaan, linnunrata on vain yksi miljoonista galakseista. Nae tieteen monitahoinen kirjo.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: New York Cityn Time Warner Center on pilvenpiirtajien aatelia. Sielta loytyvat kaikki mukavuudet mita ihminen vain voi kuvitella, mutta korkeat rakennukset ja tihea asutus eivat silti ole mitenkaan uusi idea.

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside Americas UFO Investigation
programme.desc: Veteraanit kertovat uskomattomista kohtaamisista Yhdysvaltain armeijan ja ufojen valilla Vietnamin sodan aikaan. Nakyvatko nama samat tunnistamattomat alukset Yhdysvaltain merivoimien videoissa? Ovatko ne seuranneet USA:n joukkoja jo vuosikymmenia?

programme.title: Muinaiset avaruusoliot
programme.desc: Tassa jaksossa tutkitaan muinaisten tekstien uusia tulkintoja, joiden mukaan saatana saattoikin olla avaruusolento eika kuolematon pahuuden voima.

programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.desc: Vieiran veljekset jaljittavat lupaavia johtolankoja Goshen mysteeritunnelista seka vuonna 1849 loydetysta luurangosta.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Zahi kaivaa Egyptin aavikon uumenista esiin viisi poikkeuksellisen ehytta hautauspaikkaa - ja kuvittelee, ettei onni voi potkia paremmin, mutta loytaakin viela raaasti surmatun muumion.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Roomalaisilla oli maailman mahtavin armeija, mutta germaaniset heimot kukistivat heidat Teutoburgin metsan taistelussa. Nyt perehdymme kuuluisien sotureiden aseistukseen, taktiikkaan ja lopulta myos psyykeen.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: River Huntersissa Rick ja jokietsintoihin erikoistunut Beau etsivat Britannian joista ja vesivaylista menneisyyden aarteita, jotka kertovat, miten esi-isamme elivat vaikkapa silloin, kun Rooma oli miehittanyt Britannian tai kun Ruusujen sota raivosi.

programme.title: The Universe

programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.desc: Vieiran veljekset jaljittavat lupaavia johtolankoja Goshen mysteeritunnelista seka vuonna 1849 loydetysta luurangosta.

programme.title: Pawn Stars: Best Of
programme.desc: Corey selvittaa, onko voima hanen puolellaan, kun myyja tuo kaksi Star Wars Lego - minifiguuria. Tekeeko han kaupat vai tormaako han tiiliseinaan? Rick yrittaa olla pamahtamatta innostuksesta, kun han tarkastaa Jeff Koonsin Balloon Dog - patsaan.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: Ryhma on haltioissaan, kun askettain loydetty aarrekartta osoittautuu tarkemmaksi kuin he olisivat voineet kuvitellakaan.

programme.title: The Unxplained With William Shatner
programme.desc: Kautta historian monet ovat uskoneet, etta tietyt paikat, esineet, jopa ihmiset, ovat synkkien kirousten vallassa. Mutta voivatko tallaiset salaperaiset kiroukset vahingoittaa meita? Ja jos voivat, voimmeko ymmartaa niiden voimaa?

programme.title: Pawn Stars: Best Of
programme.desc: Kun ystava piipahtaa nayttamassa Rickille ja Chumille tahtien tayttamaa valokuvakokoelmaa, paljastaako kaksikko oikean hinnan, vai hylataanko se? Kauppaan pyorahtaa vintage LP single "We Are the World". Saako tama kauppa Coreyn paivan valoisammaksi?

programme.title: Pawn Stars: Best Of
programme.desc: Spencer saapuu kauppaan uusien loytojen kanssa, mutta tarttuuko Rick niihin? Sitten Chum ja Rick tapaavat taikurin, joka myy siksak-laatikkoa. Pystyvatko he tekemaan tarjouksen? Corey hammentyy muinaisista kolikoista tehdysta kaulakorusta.

programme.title: Muinaiset avaruusoliot
programme.desc: Onko mahdollista, etta kehittynyt sivilisaatio asutti maapalloa jo tuhansia vuosia sitten? Saattavatko tarinat muinaisista jumalista ja yliluonnollisista olennoista olla muutakin kuin legendaa?

programme.title: Muinaiset avaruusoliot
programme.desc: Kaikkialla muinaisessa maailmassa on kuvauksia salaperaisista hahmoista, jotka nayttavat olevan puoliksi ihmisia ja puoliksi lintuja. Monissa kulttuureissa niita kunnioitetaan jumalallisina olentoina, joilla on maagisia kykyja.

programme.title: The Unbelievable With Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: Apinan rauhaset kuolemattomuuteen, hypnotisoidut salamurhaajat ja kyborgipari, jolla on aivoyhteys. Tutkimme joitakin kaikkien aikojen oudoimpia kokeita. Kaksipaisista koirista kivestensiirtoihin... Valmistaudu hammastymaan ja hieman allottymaan.

programme.title: Pawn Stars: Best Of
programme.desc: Corey selvittaa, onko voima hanen puolellaan, kun myyja tuo kaksi Star Wars Lego - minifiguuria. Tekeeko han kaupat vai tormaako han tiiliseinaan? Rick yrittaa olla pamahtamatta innostuksesta, kun han tarkastaa Jeff Koonsin Balloon Dog - patsaan.

programme.title: Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Tiimin vuoden viimeisen kokeen jalkeen koko Skinwalker Ranchilla tehdaan hammastyttavia paljastuksia.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: Ryhma on haltioissaan, kun askettain loydetty aarrekartta osoittautuu tarkemmaksi kuin he olisivat voineet kuvitellakaan.
